programme.title: Countdown to Catastrophe: Storms

programme.title: Mystical Volcano of Indonesia: Kawah Ijen

programme.title: Java in Jeopardy

programme.title: Danger Zone

programme.title: Danger Zone

programme.title: Danger Zone

programme.desc: The Electra returns from repairs and the crew takes it right back to the ice strip that it set off from before the crash landing last year. Tyler works up the courage to confront Joe about a big decision. A hotshot Australian pilot tries to earn a job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Rock Stars and Rampies
programme.desc: Facing Joe's wrath, Rod and Cory head to the UK to make urgent water bomber repairs. David tries to prove himself to Devan in the C-46 but ends up infuriating Devan. Will makes an ultimatum in Hay River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Ice Camp
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chuck's hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Frozen Solid
programme.desc: AJ and James battle a DC-4 engine fire. It's Joe's 69th birthday - and he's never flown a helicopter before, so Mikey plans a special gift of chopper flight lessons.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Power Crash
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Breakdown
programme.desc: Co-pilot Graeme's fumbles his Electra training landings. Chris stresses over his C-46 check ride. Adam rescues a stranded C-46.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part I
programme.desc: After being charged with crimes he didn't commit, Jack Atlas scrambles to uncover the truth before his friends and fans turn their back on him for good.
programme.sub-title: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part II
programme.desc: With Jack Atlas on the run, Yusei and Crow set out in search of their pal, hoping to clear his good name before bad turns to worse.
programme.sub-title: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: When Zora's stubborn son Leon suddenly returns home, Crow picks a duel with him to help him realize that the ongoing quarrel he has with his mother is much ado about nothing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Duelist For Hire
programme.desc: When Yusei heads to a tumbleweed town at the request of some locals, he quickly finds himself in the middle of two feuding families - with his old friend Kalin right there with him!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Showdown at Sundown: Part I
programme.desc: When Yusei challenges Kalin to a duel, he hopes to save his old acquaintance from a terrible fate. However, the dueling gets dicey when it becomes clear that Kalin doesn't necessarily want to be saved!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Showdown at Sundown: Part II
programme.desc: As Yusei continues to duel his best to save Kalin from a most unhappy ending, he suddenly finds himself double crossed by his supposed allies and in desperate need of some saving of his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Race to Escape: Part I
programme.desc: After being double crossed and sent to the mines by his supposed allies, Yusei hatches a plan to escape. Can Yusei find a way out, or will he and Kalin be forced to work the mines forever?
programme.sub-title: The Race to Escape: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Race to Escape: Part II
programme.desc: It's a high-speed minecart chase as Kalin and Yusei scramble to rescue Sergio's family from the clutches of the Crash Town mine. When Lawton and his goons gain up on the fleeing family, things take a heartbreaking turn.
programme.sub-title: The Race to Escape: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Clash at Crash Town: Part I
programme.desc: The sinister Lawton has captured West and Nico and gained control of Crash Town, but Yusei and Kalin have no intention of letting him get away with it. It's the ultimate showdown as the dueling duo confront Lawton in a winner-takes-all battle.
programme.sub-title: Clash at Crash Town: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Clash at Crash Town: Part II
programme.desc: As the clash between Lawton, Yusei and Kalin comes to a climactic close, Yusei and Kalin must figure out a way to defeat Lawton before his deck destroys their dreams of freeing everyone in the mines.
programme.sub-title: Clash at Crash Town: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Question of the Card
programme.desc: When Sherry breaks into a city building in search of answers about a very special duel card, she finds a lot more than she bargained for.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Keeping a Promise: Part I
programme.desc: When Crow looks to avenge a missing colleague, he ends up finding an old friend who turns out not to be what he seems.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Keeping a Promise: Part II
programme.desc: Crow takes on an old friend in a duel to determine the truth about a colleague's mysterious disappearance.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Natural Instincts: Part I
programme.desc: A little fender bender turns into a friendly duel when Crow smashes into one of Team Unicorn's duelists on the tournament practice lanes only this was no accident and Team Unicorn's intentions are anything but friendly.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Natural Instincts: Part II
programme.desc: New threats are on the horizon and no one can be trusted. Sherry arrives to inform Yusei that she suspects the sinister forces of Iliaster have infiltrated the tournament.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Power Plays
programme.desc: Can Jack and his power-packed deck bring down his opponent or will Andre's secret plan place Jack and Team 5D's on the brink of elimination?

programme.title: Transylvania 6-5000
programme.desc: Two tabloid reporters (Jeff Goldblum, Ed Begley Jr.) go to a strange land to check on rumors of monsters running amok.

programme.title: Empire Records
programme.desc: A group of young, anti-establishment Gen-X employees fight to save their record store from being overtaken by a conglomerate retail record corporation.

programme.title: The Walking Deceased
programme.desc: The Walking Deceased are coming for you! Starring Dave Sheridan (Scary Movie, Horrible Bosses) and Joey Oglesby (Prison Break) this hilarious spoof of The Walking Dead will transport you into the land of the living dead.

programme.title: The Coed and the Zombie Stoner
programme.desc: When a sorority girl falls in love with a zombie, it's only a matter of time before a zombie apocalypse is unleashed on campus. The sorority girl finds that weed is the cure--now she must smoke out the entire school before it's too late.

programme.title: Sunday School Musical
programme.desc: Two competing groups of high school students must rally together and enter a song and dance competition in order to save their church from closing.

programme.title: Merlin and the War of the Dragons
programme.desc: An army of dragons invade the crippled English countryside and the apprentice wizard Merlin must confront the fire-breathing beasts.
programme.sub-title: Merlin and the War of the Dragons (2008)

programme.title: Exorcism: The Possession of Gail Bowers
programme.desc: Based on one of the true incidents that inspired THE EXORCIST, a psychiatrist suggests that the parents perform an actual Catholic exorcism on their daughter, who actually believes she is possessed.
programme.sub-title: Exorcism: The Possession of Gail Bowers (2006)

programme.title: Halloween Night
programme.desc: Halloween Night, 1982, an inmate of a maximum security facility escapes after murdering two guards. Upon returning to the house where he was born, he goes on a killing spree that will make him Southern California's greatest mass murderer.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo: Horror at Sandhole Cottage - Part 2
programme.desc: Sean continues his investigation of Sandhole Cottage and appears to be in direct contact with the spirits that haunted any tenants that came to live there. Will he finally get them to rest?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo: Opening The Book at Leeds Library - Part 1
programme.desc: Sean delves deep and opens a new chapter for the Ghost Dimension Flying Solo series as he investigates Leeds Library, to uncover what is haunting and frightening the staff that work here.
programme.sub-title: Opening The Book at Leeds Library - Part 1

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo: Closing The Book at Leeds Library - Part 2
programme.desc: Sean continues his investigation at Leeds Library and attempts to communicate with a spirit known by the name of Sternberg. Will his investigation have a happy ending?
programme.sub-title: Closing The Book at Leeds Library - Part 2

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo: Secret Spirits at The Old Market Tavern - Part 1
programme.desc: Sean heads to Altrincham, Greater Manchester to investigate The Old Market Tavern. Once used as a coaching inn and a court house, many spirits still lurk here and Sean captures one of the most clearest EVP's ever.
programme.sub-title: Secret Spirits at The Old Market Tavern - Part 1

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo: Secret Spirits at The Old Market Tavern - Part 2
programme.desc: Sean continues his paranormal investigation at The Old Market Tavern and he appears to have attracted the attention of spirit that launches a physical attack on him. Will he survive the night?
programme.sub-title: Secret Spirits at The Old Market Tavern - Part 2

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Lockdown
programme.desc: Many urban explorers have encountered paranormal activity inside of the building, including child like figures, unexplained voices and strange knocking sounds. Will anything from the ghost dimension make contact?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Lockdown
programme.desc: Ghost Dimension's Bex and Sean investigate Norris Green Mansion. A 17th Century building, which is believed to hold some of the most haunted spirits in Liverpool. Will they make contact its ghostly entities tonight?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Lockdown
programme.desc: Ghost Dimension's Bex and Sean head to New Mills and investigate a home situated on the grounds of death and destruction from the bombings of WW2. Will any of the spirits lost in this disaster come forward and make contact during the investigation today?

programme.title: Hold Your Breath
programme.desc: This high concept disaster thriller stars Olga Kurylenko (Quantum of Solace) and Romain Duris (All the money in the world). When an earthquake hits Paris, a deadly toxic mist appears in the city.

programme.title: Primer
programme.desc: By day, a small group of engineers work for a large corporation. By night, they conduct extracurricular experiments in their garage. While tweaking their latest project, they accidentally discover it has highly unexpected capabilities...

programme.title: Jack The Ripper
programme.desc: London, 1888. A young woman plays a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with England's most famous serial killer. Staring: Sonja Gerhardt, Falk Hentschel, Nicholas Farrell

programme.title: Wither
programme.desc: A bloody, scary tale of demonic possession. A group of naive young people find their carefree weekend in an isolated country house unhinged when one of them accidentally unleashes a mysterious and murderous creature trapped in the basement.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Fiendish Experiment!
programme.desc: Zarkov literally loses his mind in a dangerous Dynacrystal experiment, enabling Ming to lure Flash and Dale into a deadly trap.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Dungeons of Despair!
programme.desc: Ming throws Lynch in jail, but his replacement performs so well that Flash, Aura and Barin trick Ming getting Lynch back.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Treasure of the Depths!
programme.desc: Talon discovers Ming's powerful energy source, a priceless hoard of Dynacrystals hidden deep in a mountain lake.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Fortress of Fear!
programme.desc: Ming prepares to attack King Vultan of the Hawk People. It's up to Flash and Talon to keep Hawk City from being blown from the sky.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye The Carpenter
programme.desc: Olive Oyl wants a picture hung on a wall in her house, so she calls in Popeye and Bluto to do this. However, Popeye and Bluto fight so much between themselves they end up wrecking Olive's house.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: The Ski's The Limit
programme.desc: Olive Oyl is teaching Swee'Pea how to skate. Popeye tried to learn also, but falls. Meanwhile Swee'Pea is in danger and Olive tries to rescue him but in vain. Popeye goes to their rescue and saves them both.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye The Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Popeye has spent seven days and sleepless nights on the high seas. When he returns he wants to call Olive Oyl but he falls asleep, and starts to sleep-walk onto the roof of the boat.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: A Whale of a Tale
programme.desc: Popeye's nephews can't sleep so he tells them a story about a man who was swallowed by a whale and who rescues a mermaid (Olive) from marrying King Neptune.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye Goes Sailing
programme.desc: Bluto invites Olive to go sailing with him, but because Popeye also wants to go along Bluto destroys his boat and sinks Popeye with it.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: A Seal with Appeal
programme.desc: Popeye and his nephews go fishing in his boat and they find a seal that they want to keep as a pet.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Wilder than Usual Blue Yonder
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive for a ride in his home made airplane but she doesn't like it.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye Out West
programme.desc: Olive is performing for an audience that doesn't like her show. As the audience starts to make more and more noise, Popeye becomes very angry and challenges them to a show-down at sun-down.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Heir-Brained Popeye
programme.desc: After going to a great deal of trouble to read the will that Popeye's unknown uncle left him, Popeye finds out that what he has been left isn't money but debts.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye & Bigfoot
programme.desc: Popeye and Olive go camping and meet Big Foot who happens to be Bluto in disguise.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Close Encounters of the Third Spinach
programme.desc: In this space-age scenario, Popeye rescues Princess Olivepit from Dark Bluto with the aid of an old man who turns out to be Popeye's long lost father.
programme.sub-title: Close Encounters of the Third Spinach

programme.title: Chubby Children
programme.desc: Jamie’s parents find it difficult to refuse their son’s demands for food. His mother, whose father died of a heart attack, is particularly worried.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Binge eater Wayne swaps diets with fussy eater Lucia. And Anna Richardson tries tower running, ultrasound and infra red, as she bids to get herself a perfect pair of legs.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Junk food addict Andy moves into the feeding clinic with `too-busy-to-eat' Hannah, who battles with Andy's junk food medley as she forces down pizzas, burgers and kebabs.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Last year superskinny Gillian and supersize Phillipa entered the feeding clinic to help each other unlock their dysfunctional relationship with food. How are getting on?

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: This week it’s non stop tears and tantrums as 21 stone 5lbs LouiseHayes is forced to swap her normal 5-6 course feasts for superskinny Josh Evans‘s diet which barely features a proper meal.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: This week it’s atale of twoAmy’s in the feeding clinic as Supersize Amy Green who tips the scales at a staggering 20 stone 8lbs swaps diets with Superskinny Amy Walsh who only weighs 7 stone 10.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: It’s a highly emotional week in the feeding clinic as fat and sugar junkie 29 year old Danni Brooke from Lincolnshire swaps diets with 21 year old Superskinny food phobicVicki Smith from Glasgow.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: A year ago, superskinny single Mum Kim weighed in at a shocking 6 stone 2. She was a seriously fussy under eater. And her BMI of 15.4 was one of the lowest Dr Jessen had ever seen.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander view a flat in Plymouth, a house in London and a Bristol garage.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 7
programme.desc: Lucy & Martin visit a gorgeous cottage in Devon, a rather ordinary house in Hemel Hempstead, and in Harrogate, a fantastic family home is on offer.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 12
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a property in Staffordshire, a bright house in Hertfordshire and property in Cornwall.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view properties Gwent, West Sussex and Liverpool.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 17
programme.desc: We visit a picturesque cottage in Newquay that draws plenty of attention at auction. In Stockport, there's an office block up for auction which could be great and in Kent, there's a three bedroom end terrace house in a good area.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander visit a house in Derby, a pump house in Oxfordshire and a cottage in Plymouth.

programme.title: Castle of the Living Dead
programme.desc: A troupe of travelling players are invited by Count Drago to perform at his castle. Ignoring the warning given by a local mystic, they accept - and begin to die, horrifically, one by one!

programme.title: The House That Dripped Blood
programme.desc: Robert Bloch, the author of Psycho, presents a quartet of terrifying tales. (1971)

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again. Starring: Donald Pleasence, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tony Moran

programme.title: Ring
programme.desc: A reporter and her ex-husband investigate a cursed video tape that is rumored to kill the viewer seven days after watching it.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30: Chinese Take-Out Night
programme.desc: Host Spencer Watts shows us some of his favourite budget-friendly Chinese take-out dishes in around 30 minutes.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30: Breakfast for Dinner Night
programme.desc: Breakfast for dinner is quick, easy, and ever-delicious! Host Spencer Watts makes some breakfast classics like a Skillet BLT Frittata.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30: Pizza Night
programme.desc: What’s fun for the whole family? Pizza night! Chef Spencer Watts makes two easy, budget-friendly pizzas for a delicious family-style meal.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30: Curry in a Hurry Night
programme.desc: Indian meals are the epitome of a full family dinner. Host Spencer Watts uses bold flavours to make classic Butter Chicken and refreshing Mango Lassi.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30: Taco Night
programme.desc: Have a fun, inexpensive, 30-minute fiesta in the kitchen with chef Spencer Watts’ favourite taco night recipes.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30: Meatless Monday Night
programme.desc: Meatless Monday can be done any day of the week. Chef Spencer Watts makes a cheap, filling, family-style vegetarian meal in around 30 minutes

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30: Spaghetti Night
programme.desc: Host Spencer Watts makes Zucchini Noodles with Jumbo Turkey Meatballs for a healthy take on spaghetti night in around 30 minutes.

programme.title: Road Grill: Soap Box Derby
programme.desc: Not only do the racers in the Soap Box Derby have a need for speed, they have a need for BBQ! Matt & the RG team cook up a feast to slow down any speedster.

programme.title: Road Grill: Day By the Water
programme.desc: Matt spends the day by the water; fishing, playing Frisbee, catching some rays. What goes with water and sun? BBQ!!! Matt and his team make a seafood buffet.

programme.title: Road Grill: Volleyball Tournament
programme.desc: Matt gets down and dirty playing some beach volleyball. In between bumps, sets, and spikes the RG team serves up a smorgasbord of great food.

programme.title: Road Grill: Big Bike Fundraiser
programme.desc: Forget bicycle built for two. This Big Bike fits 30 people! Matt and the team join forces with the Heart & Stroke foundation to raise money by riding around a track. Matt feeds these 'bikers' some healthy and delicious grub.

programme.title: Road Grill: Air Show
programme.desc: It's a bird, it's plane, it's a day of great BBQ. Inspired by the aerial acrobatics of CF18's and Harvards, Matt cooks up a variety of poultry and fowl.

programme.title: Road Grill: Golf Tournament
programme.desc: Whether you're a pro or a beginner, everyone is welcome to join the Road Grill team at the 19th tee where Matt is busy burnin' up his Q's.

programme.title: Road Grill: Sailors Bon Voyage
programme.desc: In between hoisting sails and scrubbing the deck, Matt and his team prepare a feast for the sailors before going on a long voyage. Not only is the weather perfect for sailing, it's perfect for BBQing!

programme.title: Road Grill: Teddy Bear Picnic
programme.desc: Teddy Bears of all age, shape, and size join our grill team with their owners for a day of games, rides and some teddy bear repair. Matt and the RG team are BBQing a menu even the pickiest eater will love.

programme.title: Hunter: The Incident
programme.desc: Hunter and Molenski battle a neighborhood watch group whose members are taking the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Hunter: A Snitch'll Break Your Heart
programme.desc: Molenski battles with the department to protect the identity of an informant as Hunter investigates the death of an adopted boy.

programme.title: Hunter: Oh, The Shark Bites
programme.desc: When a mobster's son is killed, Devane must defend himself from charges of corruption.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter leads a massive police operation to find dozens of prisoners set free by a computer operator who wants one of them to kill her husband.

programme.title: Hunter: This is My Gun
programme.desc: While investigating a series of art thefts, Molenski's gun is stolen and used in a fatal robbery.

programme.title: Hunter: La Familia
programme.desc: When a friend of Hunter's is released from prison, he struggles to keep his son from continuing gang activity.

programme.title: Hunter: Acapulco Holiday
programme.desc: During the investigation of a series of robberies, Hunter clashes with an opportunistic lawyer when he arrests the wrong suspect.

programme.title: Hunter: Fatal Obsession Part 1
programme.desc: A former girlfriend complicates Hunter's investigation of a string of campus murders while Molenski becomes the target of a cop-killer.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Love to Death
programme.desc: Love and money are a beautiful marriage, for the lucky ones they create a life of happiness and ease. Unless the love is of money, the bride is a killer, and the groom their victim.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Greed is one of the oldest motives for murder, and these deadly women are no exception: they’ll do anything to satisfy their need for cash. This is the dangerous world of the fortune hunters.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: A lovely lady with an innocent smile, kind eyes, a charming personality? No one would suspect a woman like that would murder. These women don’t look or behave like killers.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Psychopathic killers lurk in society, mostly acting alone. Sometimes fate brings them into contact with another person who shares their cold power to kill.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Crimes of revenge are usually single acts of passion. A brew of hatred and restitution boils over in a manic moment of fury. Once caught, revenge killers usually display remorse and atonement.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: A rifle in a shopping mall, a syringe of potassium chloride and a syringe of insulin, each in the hands of a mentally disturbed woman, lead to the tragic end of many lives.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Women who kill husbands, lovers, rivals and parents will shock society. But a very special horror is reserved for women who will kill their own.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Loathe Thy Neighbor

programme.title: The FBI Files: Melissa Brannen: Missing

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show With Richard Syrett
programme.desc: Richard meets the owners of an abnormal humanoid skull allegedly discovered in Mexico in the 1930s and a researcher who has had the skull subjected to numerous tests including carbon-14 dating, and DNA in order to determine it’s origin.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show With Richard Syrett: The Mystery of Oak Island
programme.desc: Richard investigates Canada's best-known mysteries, the Oak Island treasure. Also known as the money pit, the site has become one of the world's deepest and most costly archaeological digs.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show With Richard Syrett: Energy Healing
programme.desc: Several energy healers claim they are able to produce spontaneous miraculous healing through a laying on of hands. Claims of similar such healing by a man in a remote village in Brazil, known as John of God are also examined.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show With Richard Syrett: The Execution of MLK and The Framing of James Earl Ray
programme.desc: In this re-examination of the assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther King, Richard meets several researchers who provide evidence that the convicted gunman, James Earl Ray was not the real triggerman.

programme.title: Decoding the Ancients - Secrets Of Christianity: The Messiah Before Jesus
programme.desc: In 1990, the tomb of the High Priest Caiaphas - who, according to the Gospels, sent Jesus to the cross - was unearthed in Jerusalem. Along with other artifacts, two Roman nails were recorded in the official excavation report!

programme.title: Decoding the Ancients - Secrets Of Christianity: Nails Of The Cross
programme.desc: He lived in ancient Israel, he was called the “Good Shepherd”, he was killed by the Romans and he rose in three days. But he’s not Jesus!

programme.title: Decoding the Ancients - Secrets Of Christianity: Vesuvius & The Fear of God
programme.desc: It is commonly assumed that the Apostles Peter and Paul spread Christianity across the planet, turning a tiny religious sect into the world’s largest religion. Is this possible? Can two people really have had such global influence?

programme.title: Decoding the Ancients - Secrets Of Christianity: The Lost Voyage of Jesus
programme.desc: There is a quaint perception that Jesus spent his entire ministry - prior to going to Jerusalem where he was crucified – in northern Israel, walking along the shores of a tiny fresh water lake called the “Sea of Galilee”.

programme.title: Decoding the Ancients - Secrets Of Christianity: Selling Christianity
programme.desc: History tells us that the Roman Emperor Constantine converted to Christianity in the 4th century. But did Christianity conquer Rome or did pagan Rome conquer Christianity?

programme.title: Decoding the Ancients - Secrets Of Christianity: The Roman Army’s Secret Christians
programme.desc: Christianity is thought of as a religion of peace. But this episode reveals something different. The investigation begins with a mysterious symbol found engraved on an ancient skull. The film then discovers the same symbol on the walls of Roman army.

programme.title: Notorious Women Of The Bible: Eve – The Original Rebel
programme.desc: The story of Eve opens up with a vision of loneliness, companionship, desire and love. It tells she, gives up a life of ease in an idyllic setting, along with the promise of immortality, and instead chooses to pursue wisdom and intimacy with her man.

programme.title: Notorious Women Of The Bible: Delilah – One Feisty Femme
programme.desc: Samson may have been the classic biblical Israeli strong man, but he was no match for a pretty young Philistine named Delilah. We all think we know this traditional tale, but do we? Was Delilah a pawn, a Judas or a survivor?

programme.title: Notorious Women Of The Bible: Bathsheba – Wife, Mother, Queen
programme.desc: A late afternoon in Jerusalem. A beautiful young woman bathes on the roof under the last rays of dusk, espied by the lustful eyes of a hidden admirer. The admirer, King David, is not where he’s supposed to be, on the battlefield with his troops.

programme.title: Notorious Women Of The Bible: Jezebel – The Ultimate Bad Girl
programme.desc: No biblical woman is more reviled than Jezebel. Her name lives to this day as a synonym for feminine evil. Jezebel’s story is a rich mix of historical events, allegorical interpretation and metaphorical license.

programme.title: Video Killed the Radio Star: Tina Turner
programme.desc: Directors David Mallet, Brian Grant, Andy Morahan and choreographer Arlene Phillips discuss working with Tina Turner. From her early "Shindig" days to "Private Dancer" to her groundbreaking live concerts of the early 90's.

programme.title: Whitney Houston The Greatest Love of All
programme.desc: In this film we pay tribute to one of the most gripping rags to riches stories ever told. Whitney Elizabeth Houston first showed the vocal range and star quality that would soon make her a legend in music. We talk to those who were close to her, retrac...

programme.title: A Haunting: Ghost Inferno
programme.desc: Kim and Craig move into their dream home in rural Bagley, Iowa with Kim’s two young daughters. When an unseen entity attacks the family, Kim and Craig realize they could be dealing with a ghost. They turn to a demonologist to help them reclaim the house.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Presence
programme.desc: Sarah Miller believes that something supernatural in her home is terrorizing her children.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Uninvited

programme.title: A Haunting: Dark Wrath
programme.desc: Unsettling nightmares of a dark angry figure plague Cindy as she prepares to move her family.

programme.title: Pure Fly NZ: Tauranga Taupo
programme.desc: Lake Taupo was formed in the caldera caused by an enormous volcanic explosion. The Tauranga is one of the few tributaries that the lake's legendary rainbow trout use to spawn.

programme.title: Pure Fly NZ: Autumn Chromers
programme.desc: The South Island's Otago Lakes District is the location for remarkable autumn trout fishing brought about by the fish leaving the lakes and heading upstream to spawn.

programme.title: Pure Fly NZ: Kahurangi Gold
programme.desc: If you're looking for quintessential New Zealand fly fishing, look no further than the Kahurangi National Park. The rivers are crystal clear, remote, and stacked with trophy brown trout

programme.title: Pure Fly NZ: Opening Weekend
programme.desc: Two words more magical to the ears of a fly fisher than 'Opening Weekend'? In New Zealand's South Island, the red letter day is the last day in September

programme.title: Pure Fly NZ: West Coast Explorer
programme.desc: Good mates Ronan Creane and Jeff Forsee head off on a mission to explore the myriad of trout fishing options available on the beautiful West Coast of NZ's South Island.

programme.title: Pure Fly NZ: East Cape Raft Mission
programme.desc: NZ fly fishing champion Cory Scott and his good mate Chris Sharland venture deep into the East Cape for a challenging but ultimately rewarding multi-day rafting trip.

programme.title: Pure Fly NZ: Southland Willow Grubbers
programme.desc: Rene Vaz and Mike Wilkinson head into the deep south during the peak of summer in the hope that the famously large brown trout of the region will have begun feeding heavily on willow grubs.

programme.title: Pure Fly NZ: Mackenzie Country Canal Trout - Part 2

programme.title: Secret Location

programme.title: Xploration Station: Awesome Planet
programme.desc: We head to a winter wonderland in Banff, Alberta, Canada. Philippe joins the avalanche safety team at Ski Lake Louise as they show a few different ways of avalanche control including dynamite blasts on the mountain.

programme.title: Xploration Station: Awesome Planet
programme.desc: We look at different examples of cultural science. Starting off in Hawaii, Philippe paddles out on a 6-man canoe during a lesson in early Hawaiian navigation.

programme.title: Xploration Station: Awesome Planet: Bahamas
programme.desc: This week we head to the bright sunshine and clear waters of the Bahamas. Philippe will start off getting up close underwater with Great Hammerhead sharks. Then we join a professional freediver to get a look at the world's deepest saltwater blue hole.

programme.title: Xploration Station: Awesome Planet
programme.desc: This week we look to debunk a few predatory myths from our oceans to deserts. We join the shark research team at the University of Miami for two days of shark studies - first right by the city skyline and then further out to sea.

programme.title: Xploration Station: Awesome Planet
programme.desc: The week from oceans to mountains we follow the paths of animal migrations.

programme.title: Xploration Station: Awesome Planet
programme.desc: This week we see examples of people making a difference to help our planet. We start at the Karen Beasley Sea Turtle Rescue and Rehabilitation center in North Carolina as Philippe gets a tour of this incredible facility.

programme.title: Everest: Man V. Mountain
programme.desc: Expedition leader Dave Bunting has spent three years planning the trip. He's gathered the team he believes can beat the West Ridge, but an elaborate April Fool's joke threatens the entire expedition.

programme.title: Everest: Man V. Mountain
programme.desc: The team has just started climbing the treacherous ice of the French Spur when hurricane winds strike. Sitting out the storm for five days is not ideal, as the short climbing season slips past them.

programme.title: Everest: Man V. Mountain
programme.desc: The weather improves enough for the team to get back on the mountain. Pushing up towards Camp 3 at 7,200 meters, a Nepalese Sherpa rebellion stalls their progress and the expedition is hit by tragedy.

programme.title: Everest: Man V. Mountain
programme.desc: The effects of the high altitude really begin to kick in as they reach the West Ridge. Now, expedition leader Dave Bunting faces his most difficult decision: who will he choose to go to the top?

programme.title: Banger Boys
programme.desc: In the series climax, Steve tries to win the World Banger Racing Championship. Meanwhile, Flip and Steve need to win their qualifying races before they can get through to the final match.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Camaro Cash-In
programme.desc: Charles and Trey stumble across a 1970 Z28 Chevrolet Camaro deep in the bayou in major need of restoration. If Charles can authenticate and fix this once sought after machine, he could be looking at a lot of money.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Voodoo Demon
programme.desc: Charles and Trey happen across a rare 1972 Dodge Demon driving through the streets of New Orleans. After snagging it for $2,500 they have just one week to transform it into the ultimate 1970's street machine.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: The Ballad of El Camino
programme.desc: After haggling down to a pretty reasonable price, Trey and Charles fight to bring a trashed up collectors dream back to life--a 1968 Chevy El Camino. On top of already being ridden with rust, the team must also find a way to turn a profit.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Heavy Chevy
programme.desc: Charles and Trey are hired to fix local legend and rock star Pepper Keenan's 1955 Chevrolet. In an effort to build business, they take on the challenge of rebuilding the engine to crank out 400+ horsepower for only $17,000.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Big Easy Bandit
programme.desc: Charles and Trey find their new project in a Pontiac Firebird Trans Am in their pal's junkyard. After further research Charles finds out it's a rare Trans Am referred to as the "Bandit Edition".

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: The Wild One
programme.desc: Charles and Trey head to a farm just outside of town to purchased their latest project--a run down 1967 Ford Mustang. After discovering its rarity, they must decide whether to take it back to stock or soup it up.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Po' Boy Pantera
programme.desc: The Bomb Factory has an opportunity to buy an extremely rare exotic muscle car. Since the asking price is too much, they go in on the car with a financial backer.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Mission Commission
programme.desc: After chasing it for an entire year, Charles finally finds and buys the classy 1962 Chrysler 300 he's been dreaming of. He and his team now face the challenge of having only ten days to give it the period correct customization.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Bet on the 'Vette
programme.desc: In an eerie abandoned warehouse, Charles discovers more than just ghosts--hidden in a damp corner, under a sheet, he finds a sleek, 1959 Chevrolet Corvette.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Maverick Mojo
programme.desc: When Charles and Trey snag a 1970 Ford Maverick Grabber along with a parts car, they're bringing in something a little more personal.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: The Franken-Fury
programme.desc: After a local lawyer informs Charles and Trey of an estate sale, they race over to find a rare 1968 Plymouth Fury 3. Because the Fury was seen simply as a conventional 60's family vehicle, it was overlooked by many vintage car collectors.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Get My Goat

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Cookalong Live

programme.title: The F Word

programme.title: The F Word

programme.title: The F Word
programme.desc: Three simple recipes are on the menu as Gordon Ramsay is joined by four amateur yet confident cooks.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way
programme.desc: This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat
programme.desc: Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier: The Astronauts
programme.desc: Who are these people that venture into space? Once they were test pilots, then scientists and engineers now teachers, politicians and paying tourists what does it take to earn the astronaut wings?

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier: Space: Getting There
programme.desc: The new surge in space transportation, privately owned companies vying for government contracts and private entrepreneurs looking to build hotels in space.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier: Orbit
programme.desc: Chances are, you are watching this program by satellite, one way or the other. Every day we use these wonders of human design, from communication and weather observation, to GPS and recourse management.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier: Shore to Shore
programme.desc: With low Earth orbit delegated to private companies, NASA is free to develop the deep space hardware for missions to Mars and beyond. The Orion space craft and SLS launch system are well on their way to delivering this capability.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier: Mars: Adapt or Leave
programme.desc: Air, water, food, electricity and fuel all the essentials to explore the solar system, this episode explores the innovative plans for astronauts to grow their own food and extract water and fuel at their destinations.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier: First Light
programme.desc: The Hubble Telescope is nearing its end, the replacements are ready to go, ready to peer further back in time and space than can be imagined.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: God Looks on the Heart
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Brother
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk hold the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mid-Course Correction
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby's Back in Town
programme.desc: Dog tries to nab a fugitive, named Wayne, by calling and telling him that he's won a new vacuum cleaner and he should stick around to get it. Dog then sends his daughter, Lyssa, to "deliver" the vacuum cleaner and lure Wayne out of his house.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise! Surprise!
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Ice in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog and his team fight the war on ice-crystal methamphetamine-on many fronts. They appear on a special anti-drug float in a parade. Then they go after bail-jumping Pana, a convicted drug dealer.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fathers in Law
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bosco the Clown
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.
programme.sub-title: So You Think You Can Date?

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms. Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.
programme.sub-title: O Little Town of West Monroe

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Boomerang Becca
programme.desc: When Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles, the Robertson family plans a big surprise party to welcome her back. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si gets sick, he seeks the help of Ms. Kay to take care of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie's Number Two
programme.desc: When Willie is looking to hire a new assistant, Korie insists he interviews her cousin, JD. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si spends the day over at Phil and Kay's, Jep stops by with the kids to keep them away from Jessica, who has taken ill.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Life of Si
programme.desc: After seeing footage Jep shot using a GoPro, Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life. But when Si gets on the guys nerves while they're hunting, they kick him and his GoPros out of the blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: From Duck 'til Dawn
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work, Jase and Willie head off to disarm it.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: Borneo
programme.desc: Borneo, the fourth largest island in the world, has become a symbol of this uneven fight between large corporations that exploit its riches at the expense of its inhabitants, nature and wildlife.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: Colombia
programme.desc: Colombia is scattered by dense forests and plane stays the best way to cross the country, but flights aren't often without mishap. Landing strips are too shorts and close to ravines, the weight of the cargo must be controlled regularly.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: China
programme.desc: A lifeline for the numerous villages in the region, the Duong Valley road is the only link between China, Burma, and Tibet. The film crew joins locals (and a very special pig!), aboard a collective taxi to explore the region.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: Java Volcano
programme.desc: Dodging landslides in Tajikistan. Crossing bridges that could collapse at any moment in Madagascar. Battling mountain monkeys in Guyana. Journeying on icy, mountainous roads in Ladkh. Every day, children, migrants and workers undertake incredible journeys

programme.title: License to Drill: The Long Haul
programme.desc: A freak heat wave at the MGM camp opens deadly cracks in the road; Nabors' rig is finally drilling.

programme.title: Ax Men: Teepee of Death
programme.desc: In Washington, Rygaard's remaining veterans go old school to keep the team on track. Deep in the Bayou, Shelby and Bob discover a valuable sinker cypress, but reeling it in is easier said then done.

programme.title: Ax Men: Old Log New Tricks
programme.desc: In the Louisiana Bayou, Shelby Stanga's jet boat is in desperate need of repair and he needs to find logs to buy a new engine.

programme.title: Ax Men: All's Fair in Loggin' War
programme.desc: Down in the swamps of Louisiana, Shelby Stanga is trying to upgrade his logging empire, so he takes a risk and tries out some new equipment.

programme.title: Ax Men: Don't Cross The Boss
programme.desc: In the Pacific Northwest, Rygaard logging has begun to claw its way back up the log count thanks to DJ Jeremiah, but today he's a no show.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhan’s bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stir Crazy
programme.desc: America says that Nathaniel’s controlling ways has taken the relationship to the point of no return. Nathaniel says she’s always flirting with other men and even coming home with a hickies.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 1
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Clash of the Cousins
programme.desc: It's hello Dolly, goodbye money. Dolly Parton impersonator Charlene is suing her cousin for the return of a loan. Tiffany claims that Charlene gave her the money free and clear and never indicated that she required repayment.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Website of Woes
programme.desc: Brent had big plans for what he hoped would be his big break and while shopping for a website designer he met Joe but what a tangled website of woes did they weave.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Biting the Hand the Feeds You
programme.desc: Priscilla is suing her disabled mother for the money she borrowed to purchase her wheelchair. Dora is shocked that her own daughter would file a suit against her after all the love and support she's shown through her life.
programme.sub-title: Biting the Hand the Feeds You

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: The Party is Over
programme.desc: Judy is suing her niece for 12 months of unpaid rent. Cassandra says there was never a deal to pay any rent and is devastated that her once loving aunt is dragging her into court.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Flaking on the Fam
programme.desc: Kimberly Arson claims that her cousin skipped out on rent to spend it on gambling money, cars, and wigs. Charmel says the rent deal changed the day she became Kimberly's glorified nanny.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: The Christian Crusader
programme.desc: Friends Matt and James said everything was ok until their other roommate David turned into Goliath and became a violent religious fanatic, slinging shoes and punching faces.

programme.desc: We'll meet an emotional mom and her troubled teen as they battle over the Stilton family jewels. Mom says she tried everything to put the reigns on her wayward daughter, but the daughter refuses to be broken.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: The Bad Seed
programme.desc: A couple of bubbly botanists turn bankers after loaning their hired help money for a higher education. The defendant, however, cultivated the cash for purposes other than class.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: The Mischievous Mover
programme.desc: A woman asks for a hand while moving her apartment, but what she got was a five finger discount that lifted everything in her possession. The defendant says he handled the situation with gloves, and that she's the one with meddling mittens.
