programme.title: Tyler Perry's House of Payne: Give and Take
programme.desc: Miranda visits Ella with secret hopes of running into Calvin. Lisa goes to Curtis and Ella after her argument with Malik seeking advice. Curtis cuts down Ella's flower bed by accident.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's House of Payne: Parenting 101
programme.desc: Lisa and Malik disagree about relationship roles. CJ teaches Lisa and Malik a lesson. To Malik's surprise, CJ gets Malik a job.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's House of Payne: Ya' Hearrrd Me
programme.desc: Ella discovers that Malik and Lisa have deeper rooted issues. Malik imitates the way that Curtis treats Ella. Ella puts her foot down with Curtis.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's House of Payne: A Woman Of The Night
programme.desc: Ella takes the twins without asking anyone. CJ is forced to put Ella in her place regarding how he runs his household. Calvin makes his relationship decision at dinner with Miranda.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: The Pilot 101
programme.desc: Jeremy and his family arrive at an assisted living facility in Atlanta to visit his Grandpa Vinny. What and who they find at the facility will shock the Wilson family.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: A Talk With Pa
programme.desc: Jeremy and Leah attempt to get Sandra and Phillip adjusted to their new living situation.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Captain Crunch
programme.desc: Assisted Living is the new situation comedy by Tyler Perry about three generations who must make a new start in the rural backwoods of Georgia...

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Assaulted
programme.desc: Jeremy thinks he may have been a little too heavy-handed with Vinny.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: For The Family
programme.desc: Sandra has a less than favorable reaction to their new circumstances.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Getting Nekkid
programme.desc: Mary Jane embarks on her new position as the anchor of Great Day USA while also having an interesting encounter with a mystery man. In Atlanta, Niecy receives her court settlement.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Getting Naked
programme.desc: Drama in the studio thickens as Mary Jane is pitted against her idol and fellow anchor of Great Day USA, Ronda Sales. Niecy tries to balance Dante's wishes with those of her family.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Getting Real
programme.desc: An interview with a fiery reality star makes Mary Jane a social media sensation, meanwhile things are rapidly heating up with Lee.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Getting Schooled
programme.desc: Mary Jane's new position as web correspondent fuels her rivalry with Justin as she pursues the story of a teen boy beaten for wearing a skirt.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghosts of the Forgotten
programme.desc: The PRS investigation into the haunted Lake County Poor House becomes a journey through one PRS team members? troubled past.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Night Terrors
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger
programme.desc: Kelli and her husband Riley are frightened in their coastal Oregon home. They are plagued by a headless apparition and often hear mysterious noises that resemble cries for help from the dark corners of their house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Name
programme.desc: Ryan Buell and company set out on one of their most dangerous cases to date - to help a single mother who is experiencing paranormal activity in a home that was once the site of brutal murder.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Beer, Wine and Spirits
programme.desc: Brian's bar has a cranky customer who's got a bad habit of breaking wine glasses. Charlie has been dead since prohibition.

programme.title: Paranormal State: School House Haunting
programme.desc: PRS travels to Massachusetts to investigate an old schoolhouse where children's voices disturb a couple who've made it their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hell's Gate
programme.desc: Ever since Wes and his family moved into their new home in York, PA they've been struggling with a dark force that's made everyday a living hell. Wes feels his mental and physical health is in jeopardy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Good Vs. Evil
programme.desc: PRS visits a western Pennsylvania couple wracked by a torrent of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Woman in the Window
programme.desc: Ryan and his team lend paranormal assistance to a family who lives in a historic home that was once a part of the Underground Railroad. Does the answer to their haunting lie in the mysterious tunnels beneath the house?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vegas
programme.desc: The PRS travels to Sin City to investigate a 14-year old medium who claims to speak to a dead girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Firehouse
programme.desc: Everyone from the chief to the trainees at the Clementon Fire Department is convinced that the ghost of a former member is haunting their firehouse.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lady Vampire
programme.desc: PRS investigates a case involving single mom, Dawn, and her 5-year-old daughter, both of whom are tormented by the appearance of a hag they call "lady vampire."

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Chough Hotel, Chard, Somerset
programme.desc: Witchcraft, ghostly apparitions and mysterious footsteps keep the team on their toes in Somerset. Presenter Dr. David Bull braves a lone vigil in the attic, a decision he will live to regret.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Old Hall Hotel, Sandbach, Cheshire
programme.desc: Television presenter and avid "Most Haunted" viewer Gaby Roslin joins the team in Cheshire. As events escalate, a curious combination of baths, bees and books ensures a far from pleasant stay.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Black Swan Hotel, Devizes, Wiltshire
programme.desc: The team investigates the scene of a centuries-old crime, but can they identify both victim and villain? Guest psychic Uri Geller helps to unearth a deep, dark and shocking secret.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Kinnitty Castle, County Offaly, Republic of Ireland
programme.desc: A warm welcome awaits the team across the Irish Sea. But, as night falls and the lights go out, a series of startling and eerie events shake the member of the crew to their cores.
programme.sub-title: Kinnitty Castle, County Offaly, Republic of Ireland

programme.title: Most Haunted: Castle Leslie, County Monaghan, Republic of Ireland
programme.desc: Who haunts Castle Leslie and why won't they leave? As they attempt to make contact, the team is shocked and amazed at the response that they receive from beyond the grave.
programme.sub-title: Castle Leslie, County Monaghan, Republic of Ireland

programme.title: Most Haunted: Kasteel Doorwerth, Arnhem, Netherlands
programme.desc: On their first investigation in the Netherlands, the team encounter spirits who were tortured or have committed suicide. Which shocked member of the team will they inhabit to express their suffering?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Kasteel Ammersoyen, Ammerzoden, Netherlands
programme.desc: The team concludes their investigations in the Netherlands by visiting a remote castle with a history of family turmoil and medieval torture. Which ghosts will choose to make it a night to never forget?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ordsall Hall, Salford, Lancashire
programme.desc: At a scene of tragedy, suicide and starvation, the team attempts to contact the ghost of a "White Lady." They are shocked and saddened to discover the heartbreaking secret that lead to her suicide.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: With Love, The Claus
programme.desc: At Christmastime, Jonathan and Mark try to get a divorced couple to work together for their son's sake. Meanwhile, the holiday may be in jeopardy when a department store Santa is arrested.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Mother's Love
programme.desc: Four brothers go on the run to escape a court order that would split them up.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Country Doctor
programme.desc: A country doctor refuses to slow down and seems to be working himself to death.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Time in a Bottle
programme.desc: A district attorney clashes with a lawyer who agrees to defend a friend charged with stealing.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Back to Oakland
programme.desc: Mark returns to Oakland to become a police officer again, and is reunited with his old partner. However, he discovers his old beat has become a storm of racial hatred.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: We Have Forever - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan hopes that he'll be released from his duties to be reunited with his former wife when she passes away.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: We Have Forever - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan hopes that he'll be released from his duties to be reunited with his former wife when she passes away.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Correspondent
programme.desc: A war correspondent finds himself imprisoned and facing execution. Meanwhile, Jonathan and Mark show him what's he's missed during his life by putting work ahead of family.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: From Father To Son
programme.desc: Tobe took a hiatus from his career to care for his dying father, and now he's trying to pick up where he left off. Tobe needs to refurbish his appearance so he can look like the man his younger wife married.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Dawn Of A New Day
programme.desc: Dawn Peluso is a stay at home mother of three. Taking care of her children is a full time job – one that doesn't allow personal pamper breaks. Dawn is afraid her looks are going out with the dirty diapers, and she is concerned for her marriage.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Wendy Grace
programme.desc: Ex glamour model and air hostess Wendy Grace lost her good looks when she gave up that life for a market stall in Christchurch. Hair, make up and a new wardrobe will all help in the fight to make Wendy look younger but her face needs urgent repair work.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: A Knockout Makeover
programme.desc: As a former title holding boxer and stuntwoman, Bridgett spent years getting pummeled and abused and her looks are now suffering. We're going to unleash Bridgett's feminine flair and make her look 10 years younger!

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: A Diamond in the Rough
programme.desc: Dashia is a spinning instructor by day and a feisty tenants rights advocate in her spare time. Our Glam Squad and team of doctors are going to take this diamond in the rough and smooth out some of the sharp edges.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Hope for the Best
programme.desc: Hope is a dedicated single parent who has been told she dresses too old for her age. Along with the daily stresses of work and motherhood, the recent loss of Hope's mother's has also taken its toll on her appearance.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Felicia Gets Her Groove Back
programme.desc: After the death of both her mother and boyfriend, Felicia is trying to get back her zest for life. She has surrendered to the experts on hand to help her jump back into her old self. Will she rebound for a slam-dunk makeover?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Standing Up To Her Past
programme.desc: Norma Jean is a single, working mother of two whom by night makes audiences laugh as a stand-up comic, but worries that her tired and worn down appearance may be what they're laughing at instead.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Debbie Ashcroft
programme.desc: 46 year old Debbie Ashcroft is a lifelong smoker and sunbed addict with the peculiar habit of bleaching her hair up to six times a week. Can the expect team make Debbie look 10 years younger?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Head Of The Class
programme.desc: A painful divorce has undermined Cindy's confidence, but she's trying to start life over. Experts boost her looks and her morale.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Tomboy to 10
programme.desc: Stephanie is an avid soccer player, but she doesn't get much of a kick out of life anymore. Stephanie's worst fear about her appearance is her teeth, or rather her missing tooth and she also thinks her skin is aging prematurely.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: The Most Revealing Reveal Ever
programme.desc: After years of sunbathing, Stefanie hid her sun-damaged skin under frumpy and matronly clothes. But after a flurry of skin treatments, Stefanie stuns her family and friends at one of our most revealing reveals ever!

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: A Budding New Look
programme.desc: When Rose was growing up, she was called "the ugliest girl" at her high school. Even though she is now grown up and has a loving fiancé, those cruel comments from her past still haunt her.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger New Zealand: Jason Searell
programme.desc: Jason Searell admits he's let himself go, and he's gone a long way. Jason needs a complete overhaul but can Fiona McDonald and her team of experts really knock off 10 years in just 10 days?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: A Fresh Start
programme.desc: Dawn was sexually assaulted at the age of 16. Decades later, she's still missing her two front teeth as a result of the violent assault – a constant reminder of the pain and suffering she experienced.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: The family are making arrangements to leave Leopard's Den, all except Du Plessis who is steadfastly refusing to accept that he has lost his home. He won't use his share of the money from the sale of the land to buy somewhere else.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: The family have been squatting at Leopard's Den as they prepare to make their last stand to prevent the bulldozers from destroying their home. Du Plessis and Fatani bring elephants and a giraffe to dissuade the construction crew from moving in.

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: After the devastating loss of Leopard's Den, the family are split across continents. Caroline, Liv and a heavily pregnant Alice are in the UK, while Danny and Du Plessis have remained in South Africa.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny returns to South Africa with Caroline, Liv and Charlotte. They are all excited to be back and are looking forward to seeing their new home, Clearwater Farm.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Danny has been preparing his pitch for an Endangered Species Project. JLW, a pharmaceutical company, are looking to fund an environmental project and the family hope that this grant money will enable them to buy Leopard's Den and Mara.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny and Ed release two cheetah brothers together, a symbol of their new partnership, but not all of the family are happy about this new start. Caroline is still furious at what she sees as Danny's betrayal of Du Plessis.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: The family are still estranged following Caroline's decision to move back to the decrepit Clearwater house with Du Plessis. Rosie is determined to reunite everyone, and plans a civilised dinner as a step towards reconciliation.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: Danny is in prison, accused of murdering Peeters, but Du Plessis is determined to prove his friend's innocence by any means he can. Du Plessis' first attempt backfires disastrously when he harangues a police officer and ends up in a cell next to Danny.

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 10
programme.desc: Military man Mark and fireman Richard are about to take on the toughest job of their lives. Their worn-out wives Sharon and Tara have gone on strike and are spending three days at a luxury spa.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 1
programme.desc: Thailand is in a state of political unrest and 41-year-old David, a musician from New South Wales, has just been arrested for overstaying his visa. Can the embassy get him out?

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 2
programme.desc: The embassy is called to a young couple in crisis. Their 7 month-old baby girl, Laney, has died from a virus and they need to get her home to Australia. But can they get baby Laney on the plane?

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 3
programme.desc: The embassy is on high alert after a wealthy Australian banker goes missing. Is he alive? Holed up in a bar somewhere? Or does he not want to be found?

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 4
programme.desc: Jarryd's been busted for drugs in a country where they still have the death penalty. And now he plans to double-cross the Thai authorities and escape to Singapore with his pregnant girlfriend.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 5
programme.desc: Beau was left for dead by the side of a road after a horrific motorbike crash. Now he wants to discharge himself from hospital. Can the embassy stop him before he self-destructs?

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 6
programme.desc: The embassy visits a convicted drug dealer in the world's most notorious prison. But Steven claims he's the innocent victim of an undercover drug sting gone wrong.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 7
programme.desc: Young Rhys calls the embassy after his businessman father is arrested and jailed for fraud. Can Rhys raise the bail money to get him out of jail? It's a race against the clock.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 8
programme.desc: Ash contacts the embassy convinced he's going to die after days of partying. The notorious Thai bucket strikes again! The embassy needs to uncover the truth. Is he really in danger or is he suffering from alcohol poisoning?

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 1
programme.desc: The Rescue 1 chopper team struggle to save a Paeroa farmer.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 2
programme.desc: Tropical rain has hit Wellsford, flooding the entire town and leaving a pregnant woman and her unborn child fighting for their lives.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 3
programme.desc: An 11-year-old girl has ended up under an overturned boat.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 4
programme.desc: A Glenbrook farmer has been left seriously injured after one of his Highland cows has taken to him with its horns.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Ron Williams and his Cougar
programme.desc: After the sensational success of the 1964 presented Ford Mustang, the Ford Motor Company decided to build another exciting car, based on the Mustang, the Mercury Cougar.

programme.title: Classic Ride: DeLorean
programme.desc: It is one of the most spectacular cars of the last 30 years: the Delorean DMC-12. But after 9000 built cars, the production came to an end in 1982.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Melkus
programme.desc: Revisiting the past to portray the classic and veteran cars of decades gone by, meeting the personalities who wrote automotive history, sending very old cars running round very fast circuits.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Audi S1 Quattro, Part 1
programme.desc: It's the most powerful and most spectacular rally car ever built: The Audi Sport quattro S1. Based on the regular Audi Sport Quattro, the S1 is 32 cm shorter, has giant wings and spreads anxiety, fear and excitement among rally drivers and fans.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Audi S1 Quattro, Part 2
programme.desc: It is sexy, spectacular and comes with tremendous speed: the Audi Sport quattro S1, the most exciting rally car ever built. In part 2 of the S1 special, Classic Rides accompanies S1 pilot Michael Gerber during the second day of the Rally Legend.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Alfa Romeo
programme.desc: Alfa Romeo, even nowadays the paragon of design, Italian car making and car racing. But from the official racing Alfa Romeo departed long ago.

programme.title: Go Green: Opel Ampera
programme.desc: The Opel Ampera is the first electric family saloon that is designed to convince anyone that¿s wary of electric cars. After its introduction at the 2011 Geneva Motor Show, the mid-range car is now available for sale.

programme.title: Go Green: Green, Greener, Greenest
programme.desc: Green, greener, greenest ... the market for alternative power sources just keeps growing, and that won't stop. Practically every automobile manufacturer has developed an electric car or a hybrid model vehicle.

programme.title: Go Green: International Motor Show Frankfurt
programme.desc: The market for alternative drive technologies just keeps growing and the best place to present the newest cars is at the biggest car show in the world, - the IAA, in Frankfurt, Germany.

programme.title: Go Green: Volvo C30
programme.desc: The Volvo C30 electric is a purely electric car without combustion engine or range extender. Since 2010 the Swedish company works on their concept to realize pure electric driving.

programme.title: Go Green: Lexus RX 450 h
programme.desc: The Lexus RX 450h is the second revised hybrid model coming from the Toyota Group. Go Green checks out the full hybrid SUV. Plus: The young car manufactory Artega emphasizes the importance of ecologically sensitive sports cars.

programme.title: Go Green: Audi A1 E-Tron
programme.desc: At first glance, the Audi A1 on this episode of Go Green seems to be an ordinary small city car, but it’s actually quote special. It’s driving almost without any emission. Plus: Spectacular design, unusual proportions and innovative ideas.

programme.title: Go Green: Tokyo Motor Show Concepts
programme.desc: After the Tsunami and Fukushima - This years Tokyo Motor Show will promote both optimism and fun. The highlights: Mercedes brought the study of the hydrogen-powered F125 to the 'Land of the Rising Sun'.

programme.title: Go Green: Essen Motor Show goes Green
programme.desc: It takes place once a year: Essen has become the scene of action, exceptional attractions and a lot of cars. The Essen Motor Show is T H E event for the automotive and motor sports enthusiasts.

programme.title: Go Green: Citroen C-Zero
programme.desc: No fuel consumption, no noise disturbance and no emissions while driving: That’ts what the Citroen C Zero from France promises. Go Green reviews the egg shaped vehicle.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dream Stalker
programme.desc: Street asks Liam to help a friend who's arrested for the murder of a man he hated. Liam talks to him and he claims that he dreamed of killing him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Lost Generation
programme.desc: A CVI malfunctions and kills a soon-to-be father. The investigation leads Liam and Renee to a fertility clinic. Renee finds out she is infertile and suspects that Taelon technology is affecting worldwide fertility.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Summit
programme.desc: Da'an leaves and doesn't being Liam along. Zo'or is frantic as to why Da'an left. Liam wants to help but Zo'or doesn't trust him because he doesn't have a CVI, so Liam agrees to be implanted.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dark Matter
programme.desc: When the mother ship hits dark matter, the ship dos not begin to heal itself. Zo'or is left in an unconscious state and Sandoval takes control. He decides it is time to liberate the Earth from the Taelons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Keys to the Kingdom
programme.desc: The relic left by Ma'el is stolen from the mother ship. Zo'or threatens to destroy a major city if it isn't returned. Liam believes the final chapters contain information on synthesizing core energy.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Street Chase
programme.desc: Sandoval is watching via nanobots inside Street as she tries to decipher Ma'el's riddle. She tries to figure out how to escape from Sandoval and the Taelons forcing her to solve the riddle. She flashes back to childhood fears.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Trapped by Time
programme.desc: Liam and Renee learn of a facility where time travelers from the future are being held. They try to learn from them what happens to the Taelons. Sandoval's wife is used as a pawn to gain important information from him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Atonement
programme.desc: Sandoval goes to Renee to request a trial to testify to atrocities against humanity committed by the Taelons. A manhunt for Sandoval begins when he quits and leaves the mother ship. Liam has to protect him on his way to the grand jury.

programme.title: Dark Matter: The Dward Star Conspiracy
programme.desc: Following up on information gleamed from one of the Android's memories, the crew investigate Nova-17, a suspected Dwarf Star asset. While in orbit, Three begins to experience strange dreams and becomes increasingly agitated.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Magic Bullet
programme.desc: A hard-working father of two is shot in the head just steps from a notorious strip club. The case is stuck in neutral until Kenda uncovers a conspiracy organized by an unlikely triggerman.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: A Prayer for the Dying
programme.desc: A mother of two is found dead in the most expensive part of Colorado Springs, leaving Lt. Joe Kenda stumped—until he looks into her personal life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Bump In the Night
programme.desc: When a pretty, young pilot is found in bed, bound and with a bullet in her head, Lt. Joe Kenda must determine if this was a random assault or payback for something that happened in the skies.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My First Case
programme.desc: In his first case with the homicide unit, rookie burglary detective Joe Kenda volunteers to work a bloody multi-victim shooting deemed “unsolvable” by the veterans.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Bad Moon Rising
programme.desc: Night before Halloween, a real-life nightmare unfolds when a young man is found clinging to life. The case takes a dark turn when Lt. Joe Kenda learns there is a second victim somewhere in the woods.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Written in Blood
programme.desc: A community is shocked when Antoine McKenzie is brazenly shot outside an auto parts store in broad daylight. The only lead left for Lt. Joe Kenda is a final message written in the victim’s own blood.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Knock Knock
programme.desc: A gathering of friends turns deadly when two gunmen shoot William Davis in the head. Kenda and his team dig into his past and start to suspect someone in William’s circle is lying.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Raise the Dead
programme.desc: When a tip comes in suggesting foul play on a 71yr old man, Lt. Joe Kenda is left with only one way to reveal the truth: exhume the body from its grave.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Beagle Mania, Rescue Me… Rescue You
programme.desc: At six years old, beagle Gizmo has become very aggressive. Jennifer Lee Pryor runs Pryor’s Planet, a rescue organization to honor her late husband, comedian Richard Pryor.
programme.sub-title: Beagle Mania, Rescue Me… Rescue You

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Boo and Britney Dawg
programme.desc: Pit bull, Britney Dawg, is a tricky dog. However, her parlor tricks don't make up for her aggression. Dachshund mix, Boo, is aggressive at feeding time and hates to have his nails trimmed.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Sasha & Shep
programme.desc: Lhasa Apso Sasha, bares her teeth at anyone who takes anything from her. White German Shepherd, “Shep,” goes after strangers, making it impossible for his wheelchair bound owner to control.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: The Dog Whisperer: Cesar Down Under
programme.desc: Paul Watson can't stop his great Dane, from biting at him. Andrea and Adrian avoid taking their Bearded Collie to the dog park because of her. Cesar travels down under to tame them.
programme.sub-title: The Dog Whisperer: Cesar Down Under

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Hank & Paris
programme.desc: Marsha Alexander’s rescued Mastiff has ruined the furniture and intimidates anyone walking by his gate. Paris, a long hair Chihuahua, looks fashionable, but barks and snaps at strangers.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Reggie, Diva, Rocco, & Vito, and Mugsy
programme.desc: Meet a feral dog who likes to guard pregnant horses on a ranch. English bulldog Rocco joins an existing pack and targets one of his brothers. A rescued pit bull terrier is a couch potato.
programme.sub-title: Reggie, Diva, Rocco, & Vito, and Mugsy

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Buddy: Red Alert
programme.desc: Pit Bull Buddy, was found chained and starving to death and was very aggressive. Rufus, a Rottweiler/Shar Pei mix, has bitten five people. Both need to get their aggression under control.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bikini, Fella, Winston and Oliver
programme.desc: Bull terrier won't behave at home and has irrational fear of grooming; Jack Russell / Italian Greyhound mix cries and barks whenever left alone; a police officer's Yorkies are disturbing the peace.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: My Strange Addiction Special 1
programme.desc: “My Strange Addiction” tells the story of people who just can't stop doing very strange things, including a compulsive tanner, a runner, a shopper and a chalk eater.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Star Chaser_The Little Merman
programme.desc: Eric is obsessed with Mermaids and has transformed himself into a real-life Merman. Vanessa is so obsessed with meeting celebrities that she spends all day searching them out.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Toilet Paper/Blow Dryer
programme.desc: Lori has been sleeping with her blow dryer for 20 years, despite the risk burns or fire. Meanwhile, Kesha's family is concerned that eating half a roll of toilet paper a day is causing health issues.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Laxatives and Pottery/Ashes
programme.desc: Kimberly takes hundreds of laxatives a day in an attempt to lose weight. Meanwhile, Bianca prefers to eat pottery and cigarette ashes instead of food.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Ketchup_Mustard
programme.desc: Ketchup or Mustard? Barry owns the world’s largest mustard collection numbering 5,500 bottles from 80 countries. Ralph’s rare collection of Ketchup bottles includes a patent bottle from 1891.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: My Crazy Obsession Christmas Spcl 2
programme.desc: My Crazy Obsession: Christmas Collection 2 takes you inside the lives and homes of people who are always in the holiday spirit!

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Identical Twin Obsession / Eats Mattresses
programme.desc: Twins Amy and Becky are addicted to being identical, looking alike, acting alike, and even weighing their meals to stay the same size. Jennifer is addicted to eating mattresses.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Extreme Hair/Addicted to Bee Stings
programme.desc: Asha hasn't cut her 21-foot long hair in nearly a quarter century and spends up to six hours a day grooming her ten-pound locks. Margaret has stung herself over 50,000 times with bees.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: My Crazy Obsession Pilot
programme.desc: My Collection Obsession takes you deep inside the world of four of the country’s most obsessed collectors each taking their material obsession to jaw-dropping extremes.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Loves Baby Wipes/Eats Sand
programme.desc: Riah has been addicted to baby wipes since she was 15 and goes through up to 500 every day. Brea has been addicted to eating sand for the past 5 years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Vapor Rubs/Eats Tires
programme.desc: Danielle has been addicted to vapor rub for more than twenty years, going through more than 30 jars, inhalers and patches every week. Allison has been eating tires for the past six years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: The Lamb/Eats Deodorant
programme.desc: Nicole has been addicted to eating deodorant for two years, consuming fifteen sticks per month. 27-year-old Audrey can't live without her stuffed lamb.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Juneau Waterfront
programme.desc: Chris and Heidi are marine adventurers who want Alaska’s marine wildlife right out their front door. They want to buy a home on the coveted waterfront of the oceanside city of Juneau.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Tiny Homes, Big Mountain
programme.desc: Pete and Martha have lived and worked in some of the wildest locations in the U.S. In Alaska they want an isolated home with views of the tallest peak in North America - Mount McKinley.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Dollars Or Drains
programme.desc: Texas native Colby wants an affordable home, but he’s in for a shock because, in Alaska, that means a dry cabin – with no running water. He doesn’t know anything about life without plumbing.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Dangerous Trails
programme.desc: Brandon and Hanna want a home on an isolated lake far into the Alaskan wild, where there’s no way in but off-roading through trails of mud or landing on water.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: No Roads In
programme.desc: Dave and Wendy want a remote cabin where they can escape to the Alaskan frontier way of life, places so hidden that the only way there is by off-road vehicle and no outhouse is safe from hungry bears.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Jaws, Claws & Beaver Fever
programme.desc: Shane and Erica want a home in the Alaskan wild, where it’s so remote, the only way in is by a monster 8-wheeler. Homeowners beware! Bears attack the properties and beavers infect the drinking water.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Hot Tubs and Gators
programme.desc: Duck, Lathan, & Flip are tired of traveling each weekend to their favorite place to enjoy bayou living. They’re willing to do anything to buy a home if they can hunt gators right out their back door.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Lakes for the Champ
programme.desc: “Catfish” Jack Clampit and his daughter, Amanda, love hand-grabbing catfish, so he and Amanda are searching for a camp that will accommodate both their families…and their appetite for catfish.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Starter Homes
programme.desc: Josh McIntire is an avid duck hunter and fisherman and he hopes to find a house where he can do just that. He’s bringing his life-long best friend, Hanna, for guidance.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Rolling on the River
programme.desc: Bryan Fassbender and Stephanie Robichaux are self described work-a-holics who just want to have a weekend houseboat on the Pearl River, and are willing to live off the grid.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Boaters Beware
programme.desc: Matt and Laurie aren’t your ordinary couple looking for a turnkey home. They love fixing places up. They look at three unusual homes on Louisiana oxbows.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Storm Deals
programme.desc: David and Jackie love bayou life in Mississippi. With their two sons away at college, they’re looking to downsize on the water. They’re looking for a fixer upper they can make their own.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Hurricane Homes
programme.desc: Jeff and Amelia Harding cruise the Mississippi Gulf Coast in search of a new house. Amelia lost her home in Katrina, so they’re scouring the coast for a house that can stand up to a hurricane.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Beaches vs. Bayous
programme.desc: CJ, who grew up on a shrimp boat in Louisiana, and Marty, from Los Angeles, are looking for a weekend getaway but can’t agree whether it will be on the bayou or the beach.

programme.title: Baywatch: Galaxy Girls
programme.desc: April and Jessie search for the perfect celebrity host for a seaside beauty contest. Mitch and Alex help Manny adjust to his paralysis.

programme.title: Baywatch: Castles in the Sand
programme.desc: Alex's search for the creator of several elaborate sand castles is interrupted when she gets stuck entertaining her best friend's fiancée, who falls madly for Mitch. Cody loses his cool when his new boat is stolen while he's scuba diving with Newmie.

programme.title: Baywatch: Panic at Malibu Pier
programme.desc: Craig rescues a woman that develops a fatal attraction to him, placing Craig's wife in mortal danger. A fishing trip goes horribly wrong when the boat explodes and Mitch and his mentor Al have to rescue its passengers, including Mitch’s son Hobie.

programme.title: Baywatch: In Deep
programme.desc: Playing hooky from summer school, Lt. Mitch Buchannon's son Hobie gets dangerously involved with reckless jet skiers.

programme.title: Baywatch: Heat Wave
programme.desc: During the hottest day of the summer, Craig has to choose between his career as a lawyer and the job he loves being a Baywatch lifeguard. The choice is made when two boys get trapped in a storm drain which is rapidly filling with water.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Second Wave
programme.desc: Eddie must come to terms with his past when he confronts a gang of "surf rats" lead by a former friend from his reform school days. Trevor begins to doubt his lifeguarding skill when his girlfriend almost drowns because of his arrogance.

programme.title: Baywatch: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: Hobie overhears his divorcing parents arguing and boats away to a deserted island with two friends, only to have their boat drift away, leaving them stranded on the island with modern day pirates!

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8083
programme.desc: Thomas stuns Hope with an unexpected kiss and an admission of love. Wyatt confronts an emotional Sally about the secrets she’s been keeping.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8084
programme.desc: Wyatt calls Liam in Paris and reveals that Thomas is brainwashing Hope against him. Brooke and Ridge disagree on what the best path for their children would be.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8085
programme.desc: Sally lays into Thomas for ruining her relationship with Wyatt as Quinn celebrates the good news. Flo becomes concerned when Hope discusses her newfound feelings about her marriage.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8086
programme.desc: Thomas is stunned when Liam returns from Paris and confronts him about his actions. Flo feels guilty for doing the same when Wyatt informs her that Sally moved out because of a secret.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8087
programme.desc: Sally gives as well as she gets when Quinn expresses pleasure that Sally is out of Wyatt’s life forever. Liam rallies to defend his marriage as Thomas expresses that Hope belongs to him.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8088
programme.desc: Liam fights for his marriage to Hope while Thomas continues to manipulate to tear them apart. Sparks fly between Wyatt and Flo as they discuss their past and their future.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8089
programme.desc: Brooke stands by Katie’s side as she asks Shauna for a significant favor regarding Bill. Flo and Shauna find themselves with a new and luxurious living arrangement.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8090
programme.desc: Katie and Shauna put their plan in action to test Bill’s loyalty to Katie. Bill surprises Justin with new information about his beloved building Sky.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8091
programme.desc: Brooke, Donna, and Justin wait and worry that Katie isn’t prepared for the outcome of her scheme. Katie eavesdrops as Shauna begins her seduction of Dollar Bill Spencer.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8092
programme.desc: Bill and Katie share important news about their family with their son, Will. Zoe becomes concerned that Flo is making things more complicated with Hope and begs her not to reveal their secret.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8093
programme.desc: Hope calls out Zoe and Flo when she overhears them speaking about Baby Beth. Thomas uses Caroline to take his manipulation of Hope up a notch.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8094
programme.desc: Eric and Quinn welcome Shauna and Flo as they move into the Forrester Mansion. Hope is clearly affected while reading the letter that Caroline wrote before she died.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8095
programme.desc: Flo is torn between the new life she has now and the terrible secret that she is keeping. Liam and Hope share a poignant and heartbreaking moment as their marriage crumbles around them.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8096
programme.desc: Steffy returns home from Paris with Kelly and Phoebe to shocking news from Liam. Separately, Ridge counsels Thomas and Brooke comforts Hope as they share news about their futures.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8097
programme.desc: Having turned to Ridge for comfort, Brooke is stunned to learn his true feelings about Hope, Liam, Steffy, and Thomas. Hope visits Steffy, elated to hold Baby Phoebe in her arms once again.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8098
programme.desc: Ridge and Brooke debate about why Liam and Hope should or should not end their marriage. Brooke is floored when Ridge’s opinion is different than her own.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8099
programme.desc: Hope attempts to convince Steffy that Hope ending her marriage to Liam is the best option possible. Flo and Wyatt share a kiss. Hope and Douglas share a sweet moment remembering Caroline.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8100
programme.desc: Clearly upset, Brooke yells at Liam to fight for his marriage. Flo and Wyatt take their relationship to the next level. Hope tells Thomas that he should not have any expectations of her.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Abominable snowmen, mole people, creatures from black lagoons. All these half-human/half-beast hybrids are here  and more!

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Horror films have used people who didnt need makeup, were actually born disfigured, and managed to turn their misfortune into something of a career.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: King Kongs Fay Wray is probably the most famous scream queen of the horror genre, but youll be surprised to see who else made the list!

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Men didnt have a lock on the horror movie. There were plenty of frightful females to go around, as youll see in this salute to demonic dames.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Ax-murderers, chainsaw-wielding madman, serial killers, cannibals  theyre all here  and more!

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: A salute to the great showmen of yesteryear who figured out gory gimmicks to keep audiences glued to their seats  and away from their TV sets!

programme.title: Pay the Ghost
programme.desc: A professor frantically searches for his son who was abducted during a Halloween carnival.

programme.title: Book of Monsters
programme.desc: In the vein of EVIL DEAD, an 18th birthday becomes a bloodbath when monsters descend upon a house party!

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Outward Bound
programme.desc: Bob joins his male colleagues on a canoe trip to a provincial park.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Gary
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret thought they knew everything about their next door neighbours, until Joyce and Trevor introduce them to their grown son, Gary.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Very Fishy Christmas
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret experience a truly Canadian Christmas.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Tale of Two Dentists
programme.desc: Bob's business is booming, and when Margaret chips a tooth Bob tells Margaret that he is unable to give her an appointment for sometime.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Night In
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret find themselves at loose ends one evening when, to their dismay, they find that there is absolutely nothing to watch on TV.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Blood, Sweat and Tears
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret decide they need to get fit.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Bob's Burglary
programme.desc: While Bob and Margaret are sleeping, the local criminals, Beany and Boney clear their house - TV, video, microwave and electric toothbrush all go.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Shopping
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret, concerned at the amount they are spending in take away food and expensive local food shops, decide on an expedition to the Super Save Shopatropolis in Croydon.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Holiday
programme.desc: This charming, witty animated series focuses on the ordinary lives of a middle class dentist and his foot doctor wife. Together, they tackle traumas as being burgled, going on a holiday and deciding whether or not having a child will ruin their lives.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: For Peter's Sake
programme.desc: Bob's brother Peter is a successful chef who has a cooking show producing in India.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Friends for Dinner
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret have been invited to Neil and Moira's for dinner, or so they think.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Love's Labours Lost
programme.desc: While listening to the radio, Bob observes his charmless young assistant Penny, inspiring him to recite odes about youth and innocence.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Dental Convention
programme.desc: The time for the annual dental convention has come. Bob is not keen on going when he sees that a colleague from his student days, Bernard Wiggins, a "loud mouthed big shot", is a featured speaker.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Discomfort of Strangers
programme.desc: Margaret fears that her relationship with Bob is getting stale after they have a petty argument.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: It's Halloween. It is also Bob father's birthday and his mother wants to celebrate by visiting his grave. Bob is not comfortable with this and tries to get out of it.

programme.title: Fire in the Night: The Piper Alpha Disaster
programme.desc: Emotional testimonies, archive footage and dramatic reconstructions show how survivors, against all odds, escaped the destruction of the Piper Alpha rig in July 1988, a cataclysm that killed 167 men.

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp. Starring: Jack Black, Shirley MacLaine, Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Outlaw of Gor

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: A fiendish supervillain is kidnapping star jai alai players in order to harvest their organs! Even more shocking, someone pitched that plot to a Hollywood executive and they said Yes, we'll make that movie!

programme.title: Blaster's Universe: You're History

programme.title: The Coed and the Zombie Stoner
programme.desc: When a sorority girl falls in love with a zombie, it's only a matter of time before a zombie apocalypse is unleashed on campus. The sorority girl finds that weed is the cure--now she must smoke out the entire school before it's too late.

programme.title: Freddy Got Fingered
programme.desc: A man is forced to move back in with his parent's and then refuses to leave.

programme.title: Airplane Mode
programme.desc: Horny American teenagers fly to Australia for sex at the social media convention in Sydney. Will Logan survive his fear of flying? Will the pilots survive passengers not using airplane mode? Will anyone survive? Feat: Logan Paul

programme.title: We Hate Kids
programme.desc: Nick Pearson is a life-long bachelor who is finally settling down. On the brink of his wedding, he is surprised to find he has a 13-year-old son who located him through the help of a psychic.

programme.title: How to Murder Your Wife
programme.desc: A melodramatic black comedy presenting true story of Alfred Benning's murder of his wife, Betty, in 1970's Wellington. Starring: Simon O'Connor, Todd Lasance, Geraldine Brophy

programme.title: Halloween Night
programme.desc: Halloween Night, 1982, an inmate of a maximum security facility escapes after murdering two guards. Upon returning to the house where he was born, he goes on a killing spree that will make him Southern California's greatest mass murderer.

programme.title: Hillside Cannibals
programme.desc: The true story that inspired THE HILLS HAVE EYES of the reclusive Bean family who live in cliffside caves, attacking passerbys, taking their possessions and living off their flesh.

programme.title: A Haunting in Salem
programme.desc: When the new sheriff of Salem, Massachusetts discovers that he is the victim of a centuries-old curse, he must protect his family from the vengeful ghosts that torment his home.

programme.title: Merlin and the War of the Dragons
programme.desc: An army of dragons invade the crippled English countryside and the apprentice wizard Merlin must confront the fire-breathing beasts.
programme.sub-title: Merlin and the War of the Dragons (2008)

programme.title: Almighty Thor
programme.desc: When the demon god Loki destroys the fortress of Valhalla and steals the Hammer of Invincibility, only the young hero Thor can protect Earth from armageddon.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Lockdown
programme.desc: Ghost Dimension's Bex and Sean head to New Mills and investigate a home situated on the grounds of death and destruction from the bombings of WW2. Will any of the spirits lost in this disaster come forward and make contact during the investigation today?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Lockdown
programme.desc: Ghost Dimension's Bex and Sean investigate some of the most haunted caves systems in the world. Crank Caves. Located in St Helens, myths and legends surround this labyrinth of tunnels and the team seek out paranormal claims of ghostly activity

programme.title: Ghost Dimension Lockdown
programme.desc: Ghost Dimension's Bex and Sean investigate Chillingham Castle for a Halloween investigation. The most haunted castle in the world. Reports of paranormal activity are daily here, so what will the team manage to capture tonight?

programme.title: Ghost Dimensions Top 10 Scariest Moments
programme.desc: A special look into the top 10 of Ghost Dimension’s scariest moments. Venturing into the UK’s most haunted buildings, we take a look back at the scariest captures.

programme.title: Past Hunters: Bulkeley Hotel
programme.desc: The former home of Queen Victoria is now home to many spirits who have been seen by guests and staff. Witness the first ever formal documentation of the paranormal activities in the Bulkeley Hotel.

programme.title: Past Hunters: Plas Teg
programme.desc: The county of Flintshire in Wales is said to be a land filled with ghosts and haunts. Plas Teg is said to be one of the "most haunted" houses in the area. With over 400 years of history, this place is sure to be the home of many an entity.

programme.title: Past Hunters: The Block
programme.desc: The team investigate a disused factory in Burton-Upon-Trent. Reports of paranormal happenings are common and the team are ready for anything.

programme.title: Past Hunters: Mill Street Barracks
programme.desc: Built in 1861 Mill Street Barracks is steeped in rich history. It has accommodated many branches of the armed forces throughout its life. Like many other barracks it has also been used as a morgue making it a prime location for the supernatural.

programme.title: Past Hunters: Hack Green Secret Nuclear Bunker
programme.desc: The Hack Green Secret Nuclear Bunker is a former government-owned nuclear bunker located at Hack Green, Cheshire, England. It Started as a decoy site for enemy bombers but later developed into a legitimate base. Now it is ripe with hauntings.

programme.title: Wither
programme.desc: A bloody, scary tale of demonic possession. A group of naive young people find their carefree weekend in an isolated country house unhinged when one of them accidentally unleashes a mysterious and murderous creature trapped in the basement.

programme.title: [REC]
programme.desc: 28 Days Later meets The Blair Witch Project as a virus turns the inhabitants of an apartment building into a horde of frenzied ghouls in [REC].

programme.title: Locked Away
programme.desc: When high school senior Taylin (Kirsten Prout) and her boyfriend Kevin tell Taylin’s mother Sasha (Paula Trickey) they’re pregnant, Sasha wants Taylin to give the baby up for adoption.

programme.title: Rise Of The Chupacabras
programme.desc: A treasure map leads a group of unsuspecting townsfolk to the lair of vampire-like creatures known as the Chupacabras.

programme.title: Tirza
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement, a single father sets out to find his teenage daughter when she and her boyfriend go missing on holiday in Namibia.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Close Encounters of the Third Spinach
programme.desc: In this space-age scenario, Popeye rescues Princess Olivepit from Dark Bluto with the aid of an old man who turns out to be Popeye's long lost father.
programme.sub-title: Close Encounters of the Third Spinach

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye's Finest Hour
programme.desc: Popeye is mistakenly called up to serve in the Navy. While at Boot Camp, Popeye meets young Bluto, newphew of the Bluto who is his arch enemy.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Ship Ahoy
programme.desc: Popeye takes his nephews to the high seas to teach them about sailing a boat. Bluto has other ideas and tries to ruin their day, only to learn a lesson of his own, thanks to Popeye and his little heros.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Here Stew You
programme.desc: Popeye and Olive are shipwrecked on an island. Popeye goes off to explore while Olive cooks some stew for dinner.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye's Roots
programme.desc: Grandpa Poopdeck gives Popeye's nephews valuable lessons about learning their roots.

programme.title: Defenders of the Earth: The Men Of Frost
programme.desc: Ming launches a Frost Satellite with the power to blanket the earth with a veneer of frost and enslave all of humanity.

programme.title: Defenders of the Earth: Battleground
programme.desc: Ming uses his freeze-ray weapon to capture unstoppable alien creatures, transport them to earth and unleash them on the world.

programme.title: Defenders of the Earth: The Panther Peril
programme.desc: Ming treks to the hidden Temple of Pantheria to acquire the sacred panther tooth which he will use to control the world's panthers, ordering them to wreak havoc on the world and destroy the Defenders!

programme.title: Defenders of the Earth: Fury Of The Deep
programme.desc: Ming schemes to take over the earth by using an ocean ographer's invention to turn all the fish in the sea against mankind.

programme.title: Defenders of the Earth: Family Reunion
programme.desc: Jedda agrees to become N'Dama's protege, the Weather Demon, in exchange for help in saving her father's life.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Marooned on Mongo
programme.desc: Earth teenagers Flash Gordon and Dale Arden, and their reluctant friend Dr. Zarkov, journey to the fantastic planet Mongo where they fight to defeat the evil planetary dictator, Ming the Merciless.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Jaws of the Jungle
programme.desc: Flash, Dale and Dr. Zarkov rescue the Lionid Princess Thundar from Ming and the treacherous Vine People. This feat earns them the respect of Prince Talon and renews the rebellion against Ming.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Caves of Doom
programme.desc: Flash races time to save Dale and Dr. Zarkov from being sacrificed to a volcano by the Trogs, a tribe of suspicious cave dwellers.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Vandals from the Void
programme.desc: When Mongo is attacked by a fleet of UFOs, only Flash questions Ming's attempts to form an alliance with the Rebel forces.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Fangs of Fury
programme.desc: Thundar's mother falls fatally ill, and only Ming holds the antidote. His price for the cure: Flash Gordon! How will Thundar decide?

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Terror Beneath the Waves
programme.desc: Queen Kayla and her Shark People hold Flash captive underwater while Ming prepares a sneak attack on the Rebel forces.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: A year ago, superskinny single Mum Kim weighed in at a shocking 6 stone 2. She was a seriously fussy under eater. And her BMI of 15.4 was one of the lowest Dr Jessen had ever seen.

programme.title: A Time to Live
programme.desc: What would you do if you had only six months to live? Twelve people offer their uplifting accounts.

programme.title: Addicted to Food: Sharon's Story
programme.desc: This is the tragic story of Sharon Mevsimler, a 45 stone woman who had a life saving operation – and then starved herself to death at the age of 41.

programme.title: Danger: Teen Bingers
programme.desc: This shocking documentary focuses on young teenagers who are underage and overweight, and the life-threatening health dangers they are exposing themselves to through binge eating.

programme.title: The Entity
programme.desc: Throughout time and across cultures the entity, a dark and mysterious nocturnal visitation, has roamed. Its footsteps deliberate, its breathing loud and slow. And it comes in one of only three forms: a shadowman, an old hag or a child-like demon.

programme.title: Russell Brand: End The Drugs War
programme.desc: In this personal journey for BBC Three, Russell Brand sets out to find out how other countries are tackling their problems of drug abuse and to explore how the framework of criminalization implicit in the 'war on drugs' produces enormous harm.

programme.title: Baby ER
programme.desc: Consultant surgeon Sean Marven, who has been working at the Children's Hospital in Sheffield for ten years, awaits the arrival of a newborn baby with gastroschisis named Sharlene.

programme.title: Baby ER
programme.desc: Sharlene must have a feeding line inserted in her vein, but was it done in the right place? James suffers a setback in his recovery and must have a transfusion. Twin Declan has minor surgery.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander visit a house in Derby, a pump house in Oxfordshire and a cottage in Plymouth.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view two plots of land in Devon, a shop in Norfolk and an old house in Newcastle.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 6
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a damp property in Devon, a London flat with an exhibit for the antiques road show and a house in Leicester with surprising views out the back.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view a semi in County Durham, a garage in Devon and a 1930s flat in South London.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander view properties in St. Germans, Isle of Wight and New Brighton.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view an end-of-terrace in Cornwall, a barn in Cheshire and a flat in Middlesex.

programme.title: Ring
programme.desc: A reporter and her ex-husband investigate a cursed video tape that is rumored to kill the viewer seven days after watching it.

programme.title: Hellraiser
programme.desc: Larry and his wife Julia move into their new home, unaware that something lurks beneath the floorboards of the rundown house, waiting for human blood to bring it back to life...

programme.title: The Mimic
programme.desc: The Jangsan Tiger, who mimics human voices to lure them close, encounters a family affected by the creature.

programme.title: Empire Records
programme.desc: A group of young, anti-establishment Gen-X employees fight to save their record store from being overtaken by a conglomerate retail record corporation.

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: A ruthless global cabal of financial investors plan to manipulate the price of gold by flooding one of South Africa’s top gold mines. Starring: Roger Moore, Susannah York, Ray Milland, Bradford Dillman, Bernard Horsfall, John Hussey

programme.title: Road Grill: Teddy Bear Picnic
programme.desc: Teddy Bears of all age, shape, and size join our grill team with their owners for a day of games, rides and some teddy bear repair. Matt and the RG team are BBQing a menu even the pickiest eater will love.

programme.title: Road Grill: Animal Care Fundraiser
programme.desc: Llamas, horses, and pigs…Oh My! The RG team lends it support to a farm animal rescue. Matt sets up his grills during a weekend fundraiser and stays friendly to his animal buddies by serving up a vegetarian menu.

programme.title: Road Grill: Day at the Pool
programme.desc: The neighbourhood outdoor pool is a great way to cool down on a hot summer day. Matt and the Grill Team are dipping their feet in the pool, splashing with the kids.

programme.title: Road Grill: Chef's Graduation
programme.desc: It's graduation day at Chef School and Matt and the Grill team are sharing in the festivities. To congratulate the new chefs, Matt has cooked up a masterful menu of fancy, yet simple, dishes.

programme.title: Road Grill: Picnic Maze Craze
programme.desc: The Road Grill team goes rural and gets lost in hedge mazes at Saunders Farm. Luckily, they find their way out in time to cook up some BBQ and feed all families at the farm.

programme.title: Road Grill: Equestrian School
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team get in the saddle and get inspired to grill up some BBQ! With a full school of riders to feed they grill up some Wild West plates.

programme.title: Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.desc: Spencer Watts serves up his take on traditional holiday fare, showing us that you can make an impressive dinner without the stress. In this cheerful one-hour special, charming bachelor Spencer takes you through all the planning tips.

programme.title: Spencer and Robert's Game Day Buffet
programme.desc: Game Day is a day of feasting as funny friends Spencer Watts (FISH THE DISH) and Robert Jewell (A IS FOR APPLE) work together to cook up a storm for their game-watching buddies.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Our Favourite Holiday Recipes
programme.desc: Hana (Japan), Vanessa (Italy), Natalia (Argentina) and Pailin (Thailand) get together to share their favorite traditional holiday dishes. They swap recipes, techniques, and plenty of laughs and smiles.

programme.title: A is for Apple: Vanilla and Vinegar
programme.desc: Vanilla and vinegar in one dish? Chef Lauren Gulyas takes on the creative challenge of combining the unlikely pair in a delicious mashup.

programme.title: A is for Apple: Bacon and Bananas
programme.desc: Chef Robert Jewell plays with the flavours of bacon and bananas, making dishes with each ingredient before combining them in a fun, quirky dish.

programme.title: A is for Apple: Rapini and Raspberry
programme.desc: Chef Leah Wildman must work with the flavours of rapini and raspberry, and is challenged to combine the two ingredients in an imaginative final dish.

programme.title: A is for Apple: Pork and Pears
programme.desc: It’s prosciutto-wrapped pork and pear pasta as Chef Lauren Gulyas takes on pork and pears separately and then together in the same dish.

programme.title: Hunter: Fatal Obsession Part 1
programme.desc: A former girlfriend complicates Hunter's investigation of a string of campus murders while Molenski becomes the target of a cop-killer.

programme.title: Hunter: Fatal Obsession Part 2
programme.desc: When Molenski is killed, a serial murder expert agrees to postpone her leave of absence in order to help Hunter track the killer who may be tied to previous murders.

programme.title: Hunter: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: Hunter unwittingly helps a businessman find and kill a fleeing executive set to take the blame for the company's graft.

programme.title: Hunter: The Reporter
programme.desc: Hunter's new partner, Chris Novak, is pleased when an old friend and reporter comes to do a story on police work, until the reporter's enthusiasm impedes an armed robbery investigation.

programme.title: Hunter: Room Service
programme.desc: Old passions and jealousies flare when Hunter is forced to work with Novak's ex-husband to solve a series of airport robberies. Novak tries to find an escaped prisoner she once arrested.

programme.title: Hunter: Shadows of the Past
programme.desc: When Chris Novak's estranged father returns to her life, it's not to rekindle their relationship but to find and kill a man who can expose his involvement in a drug ring.

programme.title: Hunter: The Grab
programme.desc: Chris' daughter is kidnapped to prevent the girl's father from providing Hunter and Chris with vital information on a killer and a counterfeit ring.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato races two fast estates; Tom Ford tests the latest Honda Accord and assists the HM Plant Honda Superbike Team along the way.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this packed episode of "Fifth Gear," Tom Ford delivers a verdict on the new Volkswagen Scirocco, Vicki heads to the track to test out Porsches and Tiff tests out the world's first underwater car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Iwan Thomas accepts a stunt challenge from world-famous precision driver Russ Swift.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim investigates the government's new scrappage system that promises cash in exchange for bangers; Tiff and Jason race a pair of double-decker buses.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson returns to Anglesey for more shootouts; Tom Ford visits Spain to drive the new Land Cruiser; Jason Plato drives the Mercedes CLK63 Black.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason face off on an enormous off-road playground; Tim investigates the cratered world of potholes.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: The 2010 "Fifth Gear" awards recognize winners in categories of Best Small Car, Best Family Car, Best Fast Car and Car of the Year.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato rips through Italy in Lamborghini's brand new Gallardo Superleggera; Vicki tells us all we need to know about the new Nissan Cube.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim heads to London to investigate the new craze of car share clubs; Jason Plato meets up with celebrity chef James Martin, whose enviable car collection includes a busted Formula One.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim puts a variety of car polishes to the extreme test to simulate a year of abuse.

programme.title: Fifth Gear

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom and Jonny enter the grueling Exeter Trial, a 24-hour off-road driving event that has been held for 100 years, in an old Volkswagen Beetle.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Jason Plato test two roadsters on the track; Tom Ford tests the sexy new Maserati GranTurismo coupe.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Loathe Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: Neighbors can be a source of friendship and community comfort. But what happens when a neighbor stops watching out for you, and starts watching you. The sinister minds of these women begin to turn sour and they begin to torment their neighbors.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Lethal Love
programme.desc: Love is a powerful emotion, one that sits in the core of our soul and fills our lives with hope. But when love turns sour, the results can be deadly. In an act of revenge, these deadly women unite with one common goal, to kill.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Baby-Faced Killers
programme.desc: These baby-faced girls may look childish and innocent, but behind their little girl smiles lies a darkness most adults never experience. When their inner turmoil bubbles to the surface, they become unlikely criminals.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Senseless Slayings
programme.desc: When a person places no value on human life, they can become unstoppable in their twisted missions to destroy the lives around them. These women all pushed boundaries, and shattered lives with their actions.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Under His Control
programme.desc: These are love stories with bleak, bloody endings. Blinded by desire, obsessed and malleable, some women fall into lethal relationships with dangerous, controlling men.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Behind lace-curtained windows and beneath sensible haircuts lurked evil. Appearances were deceptive. We did not notice these female killers walking by. These women wore a mask of sanity.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: In some cases, the transformation from everyday woman to brutal killer is activated by a man. A boyfriend or husband can become the focus of a deadly obsession.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Judi Buenoano secretly murdered lovers to claim on insurance policies whilst nurse Genene Jones secretly killed at least 46 infants left in her care between 1980 and 1982.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The C-11 Squad
programme.desc: New York City is not stranger to gang violence. But when a 12-year-old child was kidnapped, the gangs had crossed a line. Law enforcement raced to find the missing boy before it was too late.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Master Plan
programme.desc: Willow Springs, Illinois, seemed like any other quiet Midwestern community. But it was really one of the most corrupt places in the nation. This tiny village, nestled just outside of Chicago, was in the hip pocket of organized crime.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: In Alabama, two desperate criminals fled the custody of a local deputy. Eluding authorities, they made their way across the country in a wave of car theft, abduction, and murder.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Silent Strike
programme.desc: Money may not be the root of all evil, but for some men, a million dollars is enough to justify murder. Even men sworn to uphold the law can sometimes be tempted.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Killer Instinct
programme.desc: In the early 1990's, a serial killer stalked lone victims in the dead of night, his hunting ground the suburbs of Washington, D.C., his target, anyone who owned a car.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Death In The Delta
programme.desc: When a wealthy young woman was abducted in front of her in-laws' home, the police had no shortage of suspects. The 25-year-old victim left behind a tumultuous marriage, an ex-husband and old boyfriends. All were on the FBI's short list.

programme.title: The FBI Files: A Model Killer
programme.desc: It's a model's job to rivet the public's attention. But in 1984, some aspiring models began attracting publicity in a terrible new way.

programme.title: The Best Of Laurel And Hardy
programme.desc: The best moments from the most comical duo in film history: Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy! This compilation features some of the funniest scenes from comedies that made this pair into household names.
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Laurel And Hardy (1939)

programme.title: Laurel & Hardy: Any Old Port!
programme.desc: In need of money, Ollie signs Stan up for a prize fight against an old nemesis.

programme.title: Laurel & Hardy: Hog Wild
programme.desc: Hog Wild is a 1930 American pre-Code Laurel and Hardy film, directed by James Parrott.

programme.title: Laurel & Hardy: Block Heads
programme.desc: Unaware that the Great War has ended, Stan remains faithfully at his post for twenty years

programme.title: Laurel & Hardy: Below Zero
programme.desc: Stan and Ollie have a streak of back luck after their instruments get smashed.

programme.title: Laurel & Hardy: Sons Of The Desert
programme.desc: Stan and Ollie's wives find out they've been tricked into believing they're on a medical cruise.

programme.title: Laurel & Hardy: Blotto
programme.desc: Stan must lie to his wife to go out with Ollie.

programme.title: Laurel & Hardy: Busy Bodies
programme.desc: Stan and Ollie battle inanimate objects, coworkers, and the laws of physics in a sawmill.

programme.title: Laurel & Hardy: Berth Marks
programme.desc: Stanley and Oliver stumble into the wrong sleeping compartment on the train to Pottsville.

programme.title: Laurel & Hardy: Perfect Day
programme.desc: Perfect Day is a 1929 short comedy film starring Laurel and Hardy.

programme.title: Laurel & Hardy: Another Fine Mess
