programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: From Duck 'til Dawn
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work, Jase and Willie head off to disarm it.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Burger Commander
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Playhouse
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep themselves. But the playhouse ends up looking more like a military-style duck blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.title: Ax Men: Don't Cross The Boss
programme.desc: In the Pacific Northwest, Rygaard logging has begun to claw its way back up the log count thanks to DJ Jeremiah, but today he's a no show.

programme.title: Ax Men: Davi and Goliath
programme.desc: Shelby Stanga is still without his jet boat, but fortunately he has his trusty assistant Davi and his Go-Devil to pick up the slack.

programme.title: Ax Men: Jet Logged
programme.desc: Shelby gets his jet boat back, and it now has a new five hundred horsepower engine that will help him get the job done.

programme.title: Ax Men: Log Runners
programme.desc: The battle for King of The Mountain rages on between the big boys of the Pacific Northwest. In Washington, the Rygaard crew has a problem with getting the wood to the mill, so Gabe's bringing in a trucking ace to get the job done.

programme.title: Ax Men: Cuts Like a Knife
programme.desc: The race for logs is heating up as Papac heads onto their most daunting site yet. Loggers fall through ten-foot holes in the brush and high stumps smash as the crew pulls some of the biggest, most dangerous turns of the season.

programme.title: Ax Men: Fall of a Legend
programme.desc: A serious injury threatens to shut down production at Rygaard. In the bayou, Shelby's jet boat is back in time for hunting for logs and hogs.

programme.title: Ax Men: Rock Bottom
programme.desc: After last weeks accident that nearly cost Craig his leg, Gabe Rygaard makes a call to save production and gets his top gun crew back.

programme.title: Alaska State Troopers
programme.desc: At the 2009 Arctic Man Ski and Sno-Go Classic--Alaska’s version of Mardi Gras--troopers face a massive law enforcement challenge as roughly 10,000 people celebrate and snow machine enthusiasts test their skills.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: She Said, She Said
programme.desc: In this episode, we'll meet two star crossed lovers who battle over bills after a relationship gone bad. And if you think this is just another case of he said, she said, then think again!

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: The Distracted Drivers
programme.desc: A pair of distracted drivers wrestle over their right-of-way. Each claims to have seen green as they drove into their destination of disaster.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: Paramedics try to free a severely injured man, trapped inside his car. Plus, a fishing boat is taking on water rapidly in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean. And, an emergency medical team helps a rare Siberian tiger.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A man is brutally attacked but refuses to go to the hospital. Plus, a burning fishing boat with crew members onboard send rescue teams into action. And, rushing to save lives every day in Vancouver, Canada.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A devastating hurricane strands residents in dangerous surge waters. Plus, paramedics attempt to save the life of an overdose victim. And, freighters putting their lives on the line, doing their job.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A severely injured motorcyclist is found down a steep canyon. Plus, a rescue team tries to rescue a young dog who fell down a steep well. And searching for missing hikers using a special camera.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: An overloaded sail boat capsizes during a rescue attempt on the high seas. Plus, firefighters courageously battle stubborn flames, helping a restaurant filled with patrons. And, an elephant goes berserk in front of terrified spectators.

programme.desc: Gasoline on a barbecue grill, now a victim fights to live. 70% of his body is burned and paramedics need to get him to a hospital quickly. Plus, saving a life 35,000 feet in the air.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A woman in full cardiac arrest fights for her life. Plus, a small child is hit by a car. And, a baby's life hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: An air rescue team rushes to save passengers after their vehicle flips over. Plus, a woman's life hangs in the balance as medical crews attempt to save her. And, pumping iron or water skiing, busy firefighters relieve their stress.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A severely injured man is trapped inside an overturned trash truck. Plus, three people aboard a disabled fishing boat need help. And, rushing to save victims in a multi-vehicle crash.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A cabin cruiser is sinking with a father and son on board. Plus, an emergency crew tries to find a man bleeding to death in the desert. And, a pregnant woman is among the victims when a van flips over.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A gang-related shooting bloodies the streets of Los Angeles. Plus, a daring rescue attempt in shark-infested waters. And, on the job with paramedics in Hawaii.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A young woman's first parachute jump turns tragic. Plus, caught deep between a narrow crack atop a huge ice glacier. And state-of-the-art technology that helps emergency teams in Iceland.

programme.title: Mantracker
programme.desc: Professional tracker Terry Grant and his aide seek to track and capture Michelle, a social worker and Rob, a grave digger.

programme.title: Epic Landscapes

programme.title: Tranquil Mornings
programme.desc: Wake up with beauty and peace

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Getting Schooled
programme.desc: Mary Jane's new position as web correspondent fuels her rivalry with Justin as she pursues the story of a teen boy beaten for wearing a skirt.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Getting Served
programme.desc: As Mary Jane and PJ deal with feeling homesick for Atlanta, while Niecy struggles with public perceptions of her new financial status. Niecy's rash decision has some dire consequences.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Getting Home
programme.desc: In travel to Atlanta to cover a news story, Mary Jane's reunion with her family is thrown into a tailspin when Lee shows up unexpectedly.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Getting Judged
programme.desc: A leaked story in the press about Mary Jane threatens to derail one of the most important moments of her career.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Getting Risky
programme.desc: Mary Jane and Justin go rogue to reclaim the biggest story of their careers, while on the romantic front Mary Jane frets over meeting Lee's uber-hip baby mother.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Getting Serious
programme.desc: Justin cooks up a plan to get Mary Jane in the anchor chair, while she and Lee decide whether or not they should have a baby together.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Getting It
programme.desc: Mary Jane joins forces with Justin, setting forth a plan that could oust Ronda from the anchor chair, but Kara gets caught in the crossfire.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Feeling Raw
programme.desc: Distrustful of Justin after Kara's firing, Mary Jane tries to make it work with Lee, but resisting Justin is undermining her performance in the coveted co-anchor spot of the morning show.

programme.title: Curvy Style with Timothy Snell: Modern Curves
programme.desc: Join Hollywood's hottest curvy stylist, Timothy Snell, as he races to pull off two chic and sophisticated looks, one fit for a Queen…Queen Latifah that is, and the other, a makeover for an Atlanta mom with a serious addiction to leggings.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lady Vampire
programme.desc: PRS investigates a case involving single mom, Dawn, and her 5-year-old daughter, both of whom are tormented by the appearance of a hag they call "lady vampire."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Man of the House
programme.desc: PRS is called to help a grandmother and her frightened grandson when renovations on her 19th century house stir up the pipe-smoking specter of a former tenant named Alfred.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Spirits of the Slave Dungeon
programme.desc: Ryan books a two-night case in a real haunted jail in Charleston, SC, but PRS soon realizes the spirits themselves are being held there against their will and subjected to an unjust form of torture.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Ladder
programme.desc: A large family in Shrewsbury, MA, has been living with a spirit for the last 40 years. To most of the siblings, the entity is menacing and evil, but Sandy seems to have a different connection.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Drowned
programme.desc: Kim and her family have been frightened out of their seaside Maryland home. Multiple family members have reported sightings of children with purple lips and strange noises emanating from the nearby creek.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Asylum
programme.desc: PRS explores a New York State Prison that was once a mental asylum. Ryan and his team go behind bars to uncover the institution's paranormal past and present.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room & Board
programme.desc: The owners of a vacation lodge in the remote town of North Hudson, NY, feel their woodsy getaway is plagued by negative spirits.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: A worried mother calls the Paranormal Research Society to help her son Matthew, a boy who sees dead people. Matthew's story strikes a chord with team leader Ryan Buell who also experienced paranormal activity as a child.

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact
programme.desc: Washington State, a hotbed of unexplained paranormal activity. Between possible UFOs in the sky and winged creatures in the woods, Ryan and his team are forced to face their fears and deal with the question: Are we truly alone in the universe?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ordsall Hall, Salford, Lancashire
programme.desc: At a scene of tragedy, suicide and starvation, the team attempts to contact the ghost of a "White Lady." They are shocked and saddened to discover the heartbreaking secret that lead to her suicide.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Samlesbury Hall, Preston, Lancashire
programme.desc: Despite its appearance, Samlesbury Hall has witnessed both bloodshed and betrayal. As they attempt to calm evil spirits, the team must contend with a religious hatred that resulted in several murders.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oldham Coliseum Theatre, Lancashire
programme.desc: The team visits Oldham Coliseum, one of the Northwest's oldest theatres and the scene of a young actor's tragic death. Thought to roam here, will he choose tonight to make his presence known?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ancient Ram Inn, Wotton-under-Edge, Gloucestershire
programme.desc: Witchcraft, human sacrifice and an incubus await the team at the Ancient Ram Inn. Feeling less than welcome, the team's apprehensions will ultimately turn into terror with violent repercussions.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Pleasley Vale Mills, Nottinghamshire
programme.desc: The team visits the remote Pleasley Vale Mills. With so many victims from its industrial past, who will choose to show their displeasure as the crew roam the mill's eerie and empty corridors?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Bodelwyddan Castle, North Wales
programme.desc: Among the art and antiquities of Bodelwyddan Castle, the team discovers that some residents would rather not leave. They are prepared for a warm Welsh welcome, not a series of spine-chilling events.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Annesley Hall, Nottinghamshire
programme.desc: From style and splendor to danger and desolation, the team is horrified by the sinister secrets that Annesley Hall still harbors. Their investigation culminates in an amazing phenomenon.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Correspondent
programme.desc: A war correspondent finds himself imprisoned and facing execution. Meanwhile, Jonathan and Mark show him what's he's missed during his life by putting work ahead of family.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Aloha
programme.desc: A Hawaiian singer learns to overcome self-pity after being disabled in a truck accident.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Dolphin Song for Lee - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a teenage cancer patient named Lee who wants to save the dolphins.
programme.sub-title: A Dolphin Song for Lee - Part 1

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Lee's cancer is now in remission. She gets back to work on her save-the-dolphins campaign.
programme.sub-title: A Dolphin Song for Lee - Part 2

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Heaven Nose, Mister Smith
programme.desc: Jonathan must stop an angel who's back on Earth with the intention of breaking up his son's marriage.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: A chauvinistic coach doesn't want a female wide receiver on his junior-high football team.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Whose Trash Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Mark's friend is running for public office, and he's a very honest man. But things get out of hand when an opponent tries to win by going after his son.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: A Fresh Start
programme.desc: Dawn was sexually assaulted at the age of 16. Decades later, she's still missing her two front teeth as a result of the violent assault – a constant reminder of the pain and suffering she experienced.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: All Boys to All Glamour
programme.desc: Patty is a busy mom, shuttling the kids to school and basketball games. In a house with three boys, a husband and even a male dog, Patty's girl-time gets lost in the shuffle. The Glam Squad and our doctors are going to give Patty some time for herself.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Sharon Evans "One Year On"
programme.desc: Sharon Evans was one of the most breath-taking transformations of last series. Has Sharon managed to ditch the floral body warner forever or slipped back in to her old ways?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger New Zealand: Jo Imrie
programme.desc: Jo Imrie refuses to exercise, smokes like a chimney, and has stopped caring about fashion. Recently mistaken for a granny she wants to change and desperately needs the help of Fiona McDonald and her team of experts. But are they up to the challenge?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger New Zealand: Pam Coils
programme.desc: Recently graduated, Pam Coils is after her perfect job. But unfortunately, first impressions count and Pam thinks she makes a bad one. With the help of a team of experts, Fiona McDonald aims to roll back the years and inject Pam with some self-confidence.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Eileen Breading
programme.desc: 48 year old Eileen Breading from Peterborough used to live life in the fast lane. However, nine years ago she gave up the high life, choosing instead to care for her elderly mother full time. Cue Nicky Hambleton-Jones and her expert team.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Age Defense
programme.desc: Katie is a stay-at-home mom who put her own aspirations on hold for her husband and kids, but now she's ready to start fresh. After a little cosmetic tweaking to perfect her smile and high-tech dermatology to help her skin, she's ready to strike back.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Sue Chamberlain
programme.desc: For the past 12 years Sue Chamberlain has been harbouring a devastating secret. She's entirely lost her confidence and her youth. Presenter Nicky Hambleton-Jones and a team of experts revive Sue's confidence.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Bringin’ Back the Lovin’ Feeling
programme.desc: As a working mom of two toddlers, Sara has no time for hairstyles and fancy clothes. She used to spend hours in the gym but now she's traded in her workout schedule for changing diapers and story time.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Life Lessons for Linda
programme.desc: Linda's a stay-at-home mom whose two sons have left the nest for college, so she's decided to go back to school as well! Not wanting to be viewed as the "Mom" on campus, Linda wants to update her appearance so she can look and feel more confident.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Truly A Trophy
programme.desc: Rapid aging as a result of early menopause left Deborah feeling stressed out and feeling anything but sexy. She is sick of spending her days in sweats and wants to feel like a woman again.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Mission: Makeover
programme.desc: Jennifer is a dedicated military wife who works hard to care for her family while her husband serves in Iraq. It's time for Jennifer to begin her own mission impossible-transforming herself into a new woman for her husband who soon returns from war.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Back in Business
programme.desc: Melissa is a busy mother of four who also runs her own online cosmetic business. But with not enough time in the day, she's stopped wearing the make up she sells and fears her aging looks will hurt her business.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: One Hot Pizza Guy To Go
programme.desc: Frank is a husband and father who has overcome hardships to start a small business of his own. But his decaying teeth give him an unwanted tough guy image because he never smiles. Frank's ready to shed the old image and start fresh.
programme.sub-title: One Hot Pizza Guy To Go

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: Danny is in prison, accused of murdering Peeters, but Du Plessis is determined to prove his friend's innocence by any means he can. Du Plessis' first attempt backfires disastrously when he harangues a police officer and ends up in a cell next to Danny.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: With Danny away, and Du Plessis undertaking an ignominious stretch of community service, Ed is left in charge of running the Endangered Species Project.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Danny and Ed are anxiously preparing for a review with JLW, the pharmaceutical company that fund their Endangered Species Project. They are desperate for it to go smoothly, and as a result are driving the rest of the family mad.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: Following the loss of their funding, the family are in dire financial straits. Danny and Ed attempt to get an extension on their mortgage but are refused. Fiona spurs Ed on, telling him that the man she used to know would have a plan for survival.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: Strange things are happening at Leopard's Den. The family awake to find frogs everywhere, seemingly having rained down overnight; the giraffe refuses to budge from the front gate and the cheetah is off its food.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: New Year's Eve at Leopard's Den. Alice has returned, but the stress of combining work with caring for baby Bobby is causing tension between her and Danny. Liv is furious that Fatani hasn't told his mother about their relationship.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Scabby Monkey
programme.desc: Contending with overweight cats and their over protective owners was not what Danny Trevanion had in mind when he became a vet. So when a scruffy, barely alive African monkey arrives at his practise Danny is fascinated by the challenge.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 4
programme.desc: A Glenbrook farmer has been left seriously injured after one of his Highland cows has taken to him with its horns.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 5
programme.desc: The team are being sent out to a traumatic accident that will end up being rather close to home.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 6
programme.desc: The Rescue chopper team is en route to Whitianga to help save a badly injured stock car driver.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 7
programme.desc: The chopper team are about to take off to rescue a seriously injured man.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 8
programme.desc: The chopper team is responding to a life threatening emergency.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 9
programme.desc: The team have received a status 2 callout; Mark Lorimer was knocked out and has multiple injuries after being hit head-on by another vehicle.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 10
programme.desc: The team are called to a road accident where a woman has been cut from inside of her wrecked car.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 11
programme.desc: The team is responding to a life-threatening emergency. A cyclist in his 60s, Terrence Williams, is unresponsive and critical after an accident 15 minutes flying time from Auckland, near the small settlement of Maramarua.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 12
programme.desc: The team are called out to a status 2 emergency; Clark Chamberlain was abseiling when he fell from the top of a cliff to the ground. He's now in a critical condition suffering from multiple injuries.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 13
programme.desc: The team are responding to reports of a life-or death emergency; Jim Te Whata has been pulled from the water cold, unconscious and not breathing.

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 1
programme.desc: Pig farmer Keith and graphic designer Jonathon are about to take on the toughest job of their lives. Their worn-out wives Rosh and Natalie have gone on strike and are spending three days at a luxury spa.

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 2
programme.desc: Telecoms Consultant Daren and Quantity Surveyor Tony are about to take on the toughest job of their lives. Their hard-working wives Astra and Justine have gone on strike.

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 3
programme.desc: Salesman Abdul and muscle man Martin are about to take on the toughest job of their lives. Their wives Zeena and Nicola have gone on strike and are spending three days at a luxury spa.

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 4
programme.desc: House of Lords Chef, Graham and car salesman, Lee are about to take on the toughest job of their lives. Their worn-out wives Lisa and Claudia have gone on strike and are spending three days at a spa.

programme.title: Go Green: Citroen C-Zero
programme.desc: No fuel consumption, no noise disturbance and no emissions while driving: That’ts what the Citroen C Zero from France promises. Go Green reviews the egg shaped vehicle.

programme.title: Go Green: Audi Active Safety
programme.desc: The Detroit Motor Show is the biggest auto show in the US. Manufacturers like Ford and GM use the NAIAS to present their eco-friendly products. But German car makers BMW and VW are present as well.

programme.title: Go Green: Toyota Hybrid at Le Mans
programme.desc: A new hybrid at Le Mans: On the track at Le Castellet Japanese car manufacturer Toyota presents its new LMP1 prototype for the 24 Hours of Le Mans. With the Toyota TS 030 hybrid, the Japanese want to challenge Audi.

programme.title: Go Green: MB C 350 Blue Efficiency
programme.desc: For many years, the BMW 3 Series has been on top of its competition. But that might be about to change, because Mercedes launches its all-new C-Class Coupe. Go Green takes a look at the Mercedes-Benz C 350 Blue Efficiency.

programme.title: Go Green: Geneva Motor Show
programme.desc: The Geneva Motor Show - the first major European motor show of the year. More than almost any other event, the car show on Lake Geneva represents a variety of studies, exotic and super sports cars.

programme.title: Luxury: Audi / BMW / Volvo
programme.desc: An everyday van with 7 seats, a super sports car with 435 hp and an off-road vehicle with permanent all-wheel drive. All this is included in one car model: Audi SQ7.

programme.title: Luxury: Bentley
programme.desc: With the Bentley GT Speed, the relaxation begins as soon as the 12 cylinders of the British cruiser with the extra portion of power get going.

programme.title: Luxury: Cadillac / Ford / Jeep
programme.desc: Cadillac's flagship is a real tank. The Escalade is not only a statement on four wheels, it also has the appropriate qualities to be driven by a chauffeur.

programme.title: Luxury: Jaguar / Lexus
programme.desc: Royal elegance from Jaguar. The XJ is the flagship of the British brand, but has a very hard time on the German market.

programme.title: Luxury: Maserati
programme.desc: A willingness to take risks and precision are two characteristics that are not only reflected in Maserati's turbulent company history. The Maserati Gran Turismo also internalises both in an astonishing way.

programme.title: Luxury: Mercedes / Porsche
programme.desc: The S 500 was the first plug-in hybrid from Mercedes-Benz. Various driving modes enable this S-Class model to be driven mostly purely electrically, at least in the city, optionally on 6-way adjustable massage seats.

programme.title: Luxury: Rolls Royce
programme.desc: Rolls Royce is known for making the best in the automotive industry two times better and more luxurious. The Wraith is designed to appeal to solvent customers who prefer to drive their own car.

programme.title: Made In: Porsche Panamera
programme.desc: In 2004 Porsche decided to build the all-new Carrera GT in Leipzig, which is seen as a knightly accolade for the production site. However, the biggest challenge arose, when Porsche decided to produce a four-door sedan in parallel to the Cayenne.

programme.title: Dark Matter: The Dward Star Conspiracy
programme.desc: Following up on information gleamed from one of the Android's memories, the crew investigate Nova-17, a suspected Dwarf Star asset. While in orbit, Three begins to experience strange dreams and becomes increasingly agitated.

programme.title: Dark Matter: My Final Gift to You
programme.desc: Two has been taken captive by Ryo as part of a plan to force the crew of the Raza to hand over the Blink Drive. Three, Five and Six use transfer transit to travel to Zairon and negotiate for her life.

programme.title: Dark Matter: Nowhere To Go
programme.desc: In the season finale, the crew of the Raza discover the real location of project Phoenix. In an attempt to deal Ferrous a fatal blow, they convince Commander Truffault and the Mikkei Combine it's time to act.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Blood Ties
programme.desc: Strange assaults and several deaths may be related to a Doors/Taelon joint venture where Taelon core energy was used to heal people. It appears that the energy is being sucked back out of the patients.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Hearts and Minds
programme.desc: When Renee's boyfriend appears to her while he is imprisoned on the mother ship, Liam theorizes a special energy bond between the pair. Zo'or is upset by the human's betrayal and bans all humans from the mother ship.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Epiphany
programme.desc: The Taelons announce that they will all go into death stasis and wait on the mother ship for humans to discover how to create core energy and revive them. Zo'or and Da'an don't trust each other to be the last to submit to stasis.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dark Horizons
programme.desc: Eight Taelons are killed when protectors' implants are re-calibrated with a new imperative to kill instead of protect Taelons. They fear the Jiridians have found a way to control the CVIs. Meanwhile, their core energy continues to deplete.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Point of No Return
programme.desc: When Street solves the 8th dimension of Ma'el's riddle, a beacon leads Liam to a chamber with a healing pool. However, there is only enough in the healing pool to help 6 Taelons. Zo'or will do anything to insure his own life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Raise the Dead
programme.desc: When a tip comes in suggesting foul play on a 71yr old man, Lt. Joe Kenda is left with only one way to reveal the truth: exhume the body from its grave.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Rearview Mirror
programme.desc: When a retired military man runs over a pedestrian, it’s up to Lt. Joe Kenda to determine if it was bad brakes or bad intent.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Jekyll & Hyde
programme.desc: Lt. Joe Kenda looks for answers in the death of Calvin Blair, a young man stabbed and left for dead on the roadside.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: After School Special
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes when a beloved teacher is poisoned in her classroom. As doctors fight to save Barbara Lewis’ life, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team delve into her personal affairs.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Sex, Lies, and Surveillance Tape
programme.desc: A confrontation between enemies turns deadly, and Lt. Joe Kenda’s best hope for answers lies with a grainy, dubbed-over surveillance tape.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Manifesto
programme.desc: A cabin on the slopes of Pikes Peak catches fire, and a young sheriff’s deputy is posted to guard the scene overnight--then he’s found dead in his patrol car the next morning.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Where is Claudia Jane
programme.desc: 15-year old CJ Bates is reported missing, and Kenda must investigate the mysterious circumstances behind disappearance of the teenager.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lockdown
programme.desc: When a crazed gunman terrorizes his neighborhood, officers put themselves in the line of fire to restore order.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bikini, Fella, Winston and Oliver
programme.desc: Bull terrier won't behave at home and has irrational fear of grooming; Jack Russell / Italian Greyhound mix cries and barks whenever left alone; a police officer's Yorkies are disturbing the peace.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bella
programme.desc: After being boarded for 5 months, American bulldog Bella evolved into a food, people, and dog aggressive pet. Owner Nate is scared he will have to euthanize her if her behavior doesn’t change.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Woof and Wheels
programme.desc: People and their dogs descended on a local PETCO to meet producers in the hopes of a session with Cesar Millan. Meet two of the problem pooches. Can Cesar dial down the bad behavior of these terrors?

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Boo and Britney Dawg
programme.desc: Pit bull, Britney Dawg, is a tricky dog. However, her parlor tricks don't make up for her aggression. Dachshund mix, Boo, is aggressive at feeding time and hates to have his nails trimmed.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Eton & Dolly, and the Pups on Parole
programme.desc: Cesar goes to jail to help wayward humans rehabilitate wayward pups through a program called "Pups on Parole."; Bulldogs learn to play fair.
programme.sub-title: Eton & Dolly, and the Pups on Parole

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Cesar helps dogs overcome their fears including a whippet mix who is blind and deaf, a labradoodle that fears the ocean, and a cocker spaniel that fears all humans.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Major Jones, Josie, and Scrappy
programme.desc: Catchup with the hurricane Katrina rescue dogs. Is a reunion with their owners in store for any of them? A German Shephard learns to walk on a leash. A lab won’t walk on hardwood floors.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: The Lamb/Eats Deodorant
programme.desc: Nicole has been addicted to eating deodorant for two years, consuming fifteen sticks per month. 27-year-old Audrey can't live without her stuffed lamb.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Pony Play / Addicted to Drinking Paint
programme.desc: For the past 20 years, Nicole has been addicted to Pony Play. Meanwhile, 43-year-old single mother of two Heather has been addicted to drinking paint for nearly three years.
programme.sub-title: Pony Play / Addicted to Drinking Paint

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Rampant Rats/Extreme Fingernails
programme.desc: Theresa has more than 60 pet hairless rats that are taking over her apartment. Jazz has been growing her fingernails for 22 years. Her longest nail is two feet long, and she calls them her children.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: My Strange Addiction Special 2
programme.desc: In this one-hour special, we revisit six of our addicts whose stories shocked the world. Tune in for exclusive never before seen footage in this special episode.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Ventriloquist/Cat Lady
programme.desc: April's addiction to her puppets has gotten so strong she can't go anywhere without them. Debbie is severely allergic to cats, but has over twenty of them, leaving her in isolation.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Can’t Stop Cleaning/Love Rocks
programme.desc: Cyntrelle dropped out of high school because of her addiction to cleaning. Belinda's obsession with rocks has taken over her life, with more than 100,000 scattered around her home.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Glass/Bleaches Skin
programme.desc: Josh has eaten more than 250 light bulbs. But is he really addicted to the attention that he receives? Candice thinks dark skin is ugly and has resorted to using dangerous bleaching creams.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Make-up Addict/Obsessed with Death
programme.desc: Maureen won't go out of the house without a full face of makeup. Meanwhile, Barbara is so obsessed with death that she's planned her own funeral.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Laxatives and Pottery/Ashes
programme.desc: Kimberly takes hundreds of laxatives a day in an attempt to lose weight. Meanwhile, Bianca prefers to eat pottery and cigarette ashes instead of food.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Wears Diapers/Eats Dryer Sheets
programme.desc: For Riley, there's nothing like the comfort of wearing a warm, wet diaper. She lives as an adult baby to escape the stresses of life. And Charmissa chews on dryer sheets for up to 10 hours a day.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Rampant Rats/Extreme Fingernails
programme.desc: Theresa has more than 60 pet hairless rats that are taking over her apartment. Jazz has been growing her fingernails for 22 years. Her longest nail is two feet long, and she calls them her children.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Gas Sniffer/Teddy Bear Obsession
programme.desc: For more than 30 years, Theresa has been addicted to smelling gasoline. Meanwhile, former drug-addict Krista has 12 'children' -- all of which are teddy bears.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: My Strange Addiction Special 2
programme.desc: In this one-hour special, we revisit six of our addicts whose stories shocked the world. Tune in for exclusive never before seen footage in this special episode.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Beaches vs. Bayous
programme.desc: CJ, who grew up on a shrimp boat in Louisiana, and Marty, from Los Angeles, are looking for a weekend getaway but can’t agree whether it will be on the bayou or the beach.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Airboat Homes
programme.desc: They’re big, loud, fast and can traverse anything. Airboats aren’t just a novelty in Louisiana, they’re essential—join the Fradellas as they search for an airboat accessible home.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Louisiana Luxury
programme.desc: Larry and Amber Douglas started a business that has become a million-dollar operation. They’re looking to upgrade their lifestyle, but still want a place with a down home bayou feel.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Cruisin For A Bruisin
programme.desc: Join Jill and Marvin as they comb Belle River for the perfect floating home—something that’ll get them back in the swamps and back to their bayou roots.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Bayou Baby
programme.desc: Chris and Jessica are going back to their roots and looking for a bayou home near Houma, Louisiana. But with a rambunctious baby, finding the perfect waterfront home can be a challenge.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Cajun Bahamas
programme.desc: Mike Mazac and Kim Francis look for a Cajun camp where they can throw down and have a good ol’ time. Join these two as they cross lakes, navigate Bayous and motor through the Cajun Bahamas!

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Gumbo Shacks
programme.desc: Chef Brent Duthu and his father Danny are looking for a camp where they can catch speckled trout, one of South Louisiana’s delicacies right in their backyard.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Gator Country
programme.desc: T-Mike and Cayla want a new bayou home with enough room for their 300 pound pet pig. They need a place with water and a fence strong enough to hold this giant porker when he’s hot for a mate.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Fishing For A Bargain
programme.desc: Best friends, Drew and Nikki, are hopping aboard a boat and hitting the waterways looking for the ultimate fishing camp. But with floods and dangerous animals, the search can be a challenge.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Huntin' For A Bargain
programme.desc: James and Jennifer and their two kids raise Catahoula Cur hunting dogs in Northeast Lousiana. With 35 dogs, but only a half acre of land, they’re going to need a bigger home with space for the dogs.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Million Dollar Manor
programme.desc: Born and raised in the bayou, Floyd and Robin Foti are living the American Dream. Their small business grew to become a massive food market. Now they’re looking for a million dollar home.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: All-Terrain Livin
programme.desc: Josh and Tiffany Chambless grew up living the bayou lifestyle and spending any spare moment exploring the swamps on their ATVs. Now, they’re looking for a place that’s baby friendly.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Wake Zone Getaway
programme.desc: Ross and Sarah want a new bayou home where they can walk out their front door onto their fishing boat. They discover a house on an island can make getting there tough.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Cajun Cabins
programme.desc: Pat and Joyce want their own slice of the southern frontier. They're looking for a hunting cabin that has the wilderness he wants, but the space she desires.

programme.title: Baywatch: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: Hobie overhears his divorcing parents arguing and boats away to a deserted island with two friends, only to have their boat drift away, leaving them stranded on the island with modern day pirates!

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: After their plane crashes, two robbers attempt to retrieve their suitcase full of stolen money from the ocean. Meanwhile, Mitch and Gayle go to court over custody of Hobie.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Drowning Pool
programme.desc: A wealthy older man drowns under suspicious circumstances in front of Jill Riley's tower. Jill endures the pain of losing her first victim, becoming obsessed with unraveling whether his death was an accidental drowning or murder.

programme.title: Baywatch: Rookie School
programme.desc: While housesitting for Craig and Gina, Eddie takes in a runaway whose life is threatened by her mobster boyfriend. Meanwhile, Trevor enters Baywatch rookie school to become a certified LA County lifeguard.

programme.title: Baywatch: Cruise Ship
programme.desc: Eddie warns Shauni that her new boyfriend Andrew is not a good guy. She ignores Eddie until Andrew gives her a black eye. Meanwhile, Craig and Mitch must stop an out of control party boat before it crashes into the crowded Santa Monica pier.

programme.title: Baywatch: Cretin of the Shallows
programme.desc: Several people are murdered at the beach by a mysterious man in ghoulish make-up and Eddie is knocked unconscious by what he describes as a "cretin." Eddie's report is met with skepticism until the identity of the killer is dramatically revealed.

programme.title: Baywatch: Shelter Me
programme.desc: During a tropical storm, Eddie and Shauni take refuge in the Pomeroy's loft, turning a cold night into the start of a hot romance. In the downpour, two escaped convicts shoot Garner, then break into Baywatch headquarters and take everyone hostage.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8100
programme.desc: Clearly upset, Brooke yells at Liam to fight for his marriage. Flo and Wyatt take their relationship to the next level. Hope tells Thomas that he should not have any expectations of her.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8101
programme.desc: Xander calls Zoe out for being distant lately. Maya arrives and tells them that Hope and Liam are ending their marriage. Zoe is horrified by this turn of events.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8102
programme.desc: Xander overhears Zoe speaking about Beth and demands the truth. Liam and Hope try to make the most of the last night that they have together. Thomas visits Steffy who calls her brother out on his ulterior motive with Hope.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8103
programme.desc: Thomas prompts Steffy to remember the many meaningful moments she and Liam have shared. Xander and Zoe’s relationship is put to the test when she comes clean about the dark secret she’s been keeping.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8104
programme.desc: Guilt overpowers Flo when she learns the news about Hope and Liam’s marriage. Ridge takes a gamble and plays devil’s advocate with Brooke about Hope, Liam and Steffy.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8105
programme.desc: Thomas pushes back against Carter when he offers Hope sage advice about ending her marriage. Xander argues with Flo and Zoe about doing the right thing before leveling a hefty threat towards them.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8106
programme.desc: Intuitively knowing that something isn’t right, Brooke pleads with Hope to reconsider her next move. Liam calls Thomas out on the self-serving reasons he’s invested in his relationships with Hope and Steffy.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8107
programme.desc: Zoe and Flo quarrel, both realizing that they are forever bonded by Reese’s sinister deed. Xander bursts in on Liam and Hope and demands to speak to them alone before they sign anything!

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8108
programme.desc: Flo shares confidential information with Thomas, who in turn accuses her of being a liar. Hope and Brooke argue about Hope’s choice to annul her marriage to Liam.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8109
programme.desc: Zoe questions Xander’s devotion considering he’s willing to sacrifice Reese for the truth. Disbelief turns to anger when Thomas realizes that Steffy unwittingly has Hope’s baby.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8110
programme.desc: Fully bonded with Kelly and Phoebe, Liam accepts Steffy’s offer of moving back in to the Cliff House. Flo begs Zoe to allow the truth to be revealed but Zoe is concerned about going to jail.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8111
programme.desc: Thomas has inner conflict about if he should, and who he should, tell that Hope’s baby is alive. Wyatt demands answers when he overhears Flo, Xander and Zoe speaking about Beth.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8112
programme.desc: Ridge worries that his marriage to Brooke will suffer because of their children’s circumstances Xander, Zoe and Flo are stunned by Thomas sudden change of heart and his threats against them.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8113
programme.desc: Hope becomes distraught after losing something close to her heart. Brooke is convinced that Thomas is using Douglas as a pawn in his plan to win Hope.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8114
programme.desc: Hope is taken aback when Thomas surprises her with a Forrester Original and a kiss. Separately, Flo and Steffy push back when Wyatt and Liam organize a get-together.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8115
programme.desc: Xander blows up on Thomas after realizing he’s continuing to manipulate Hope. Flo and Steffy agree, for different reasons, that baby Phoebe is definitely a Logan.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8116
programme.desc: Thomas refuses to back down when Brooke confronts him about controlling her daughter. The web of their deceit begins to unravel as Thomas, Zoe and Xander argue amongst themselves.

programme.title: Book of Monsters
programme.desc: In the vein of EVIL DEAD, an 18th birthday becomes a bloodbath when monsters descend upon a house party!

programme.title: Clown Motel
programme.desc: Clown Motel follows a group of ghost hunters, returning home from Las Vegas. When the groups meet up, by mistake, they're left to discover if the motel is really abandoned and haunted by the souls, of the clowns, that once lived there.

programme.title: The Facility
programme.desc: Eight volunteers find themselves fighting for their lives when a drug trial goes horribly wrong.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: A young officer in Napoleon's army pursues a mysterious woman to the castle of an elderly Baron. Starring Jack Nicholson & Boris Karloff.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Lon Chaney Sr. was the original Phantom of the Opera, but there have been other notable portrayals  and other notable phantoms!

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Witches have been a favorite of fairy tales  and fright films  for centuries. Heres a wicked look at a covens worth of portrayals.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: It's Halloween. It is also Bob father's birthday and his mother wants to celebrate by visiting his grave. Bob is not comfortable with this and tries to get out of it.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Neighbours
programme.desc: In this story of neighbourhood social angst, Bob is having a complex burglar alarm installed by Graham, a sad, lonely man whose confidence is lifted immeasurably by this rare sale to Bob.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Bob Gets Wired
programme.desc: When Margaret forgets to pay for some sprinkles at the local cake shop, she is hauled in as a shoplifter.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: No Trouble
programme.desc: This charming, witty animated series focuses on the ordinary lives of a middle class dentist and his foot doctor wife. Together, they tackle traumas as being burgled, going on a holiday and deciding whether or not having a child will ruin their lives.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Trouble with Mummy
programme.desc: Bob is concerned when he hears that his mothers best friend Pearl has passed on.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Fly on the Wall
programme.desc: Feeling belittled by his family, Bob jumps at the chance to be the subject of a fly on the wall documentary.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Problems
programme.desc: At her clinic one-day, Margaret sees an old school chum, and invites her and her husband Matt to dinner.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Patient Dies in Bob's Chair
programme.desc: When a patient dies of natural causes while in Bobs surgery, the local papers pick up the story.
programme.sub-title: A Patient Dies in Bob's Chair

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Cuckoo in the Nest
programme.desc: When Bobs old friend Clive, (who is a real drunken slob), is dumped by his wife, Bob lets him stay for a few days despite Margarets objections.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A New Life
programme.desc: At a creepy chiropodist social night, Bob and Margaret encounter a couple who are rapturous about the new planned community where they now live.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Animal Behaviour
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret arrive home from another boring evening out with dreary friends, to find that their dogs behaviour has taken a turn for the worse.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Party Politics
programme.desc: Margaret runs into a distant friend who asks her to have an Ann Summers-type party in her home.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Going Dutch
programme.desc: Margaret enters a contest and wins the grand prize: a cycling tour of Holland!

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: My Foot Hurts
programme.desc: Margaret gets her own local call-in radio show entitled My Foot Hurts.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Bob or Two
programme.desc: Bob buys an inexpensive painting from the neighbours at a junk sale and hangs it in his surgery to brighten things up.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Stranded in Toronto
programme.desc: When Bob and Margaret take a trip to New York, their flight is re-routed to Toronto due to a storm.
